---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tasyā**ḥ ity-ādi \|
**ślathad-valayata** iti tat-kāla-kārśyaṁ dhvanitam \| na kevalaṁ
**vyajanaṁ papāta**, api tu **dehaś** ca nipapāta, nitarāṁ papātety
arthaḥ \| vyajanaṁ papāta, deho nipapāta ity upasarga-kṛto viśeṣaḥ \|
keva ? **vāta-vihatā rambhā** iva \| sā yathā svayaṁ nottiṣṭhati, tathā
\| **pravikīrya keśān** iti patanāt pūrvam eva keśāḥ srastā ity arthaḥ
\|\|24\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : suduḥkham**
apriya-śravaṇāt, **bhayaḥ** tyāga-śaṅkayā, **śokaḥ** tābhyām anutāpaḥ,
tair **vinaṣṭā buddhir** yasyāḥ \| ataḥ parihāso'yam iti vicāro nodabhūd
iti bhāvaḥ \| **ślathanti valayāni** yasmād **dhastād** iti sahasaiva
viraha-pīḍotthād atikārśyād valayāny api petur iti gamyate \|
tad-anantaraṁ **dehaś ca papāta** \| tatra hetuḥ---**viklava-dhiya** iti
\| buddher nāśasyāpi prāgukter naṣṭa-cetanāyā ity arthaḥ \| tataś ca
**muhyan** iti sahasaiva navamy api daśā \| ataḥ **papāta** iti
stambhādy-antimaḥ pralayaś ca sāttviko'bhūd iti bhāvaḥ \|\|24\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.25 \|\|**

**tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ priyāyāḥ prema-bandhanam \|**

**hāsya-prauḍhim ajānantyāḥ karuṇaḥ so'nvakampata \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : hāsyasya prauḍhiṁ** gāmbhīryam
\|\|25\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : tat** **prema-bandhanam** \|
prauḍhir gāmbhīrya-śakaṭīdhāraṇāsv adhike\'pi ca iti niruktiḥ \| **sa**
kṛṣṇaḥ \| yathā sāṁsārika-jīvānām avidyayā bandhanaṁ, tathā tasyāḥ
premṇā bandhanaṁ \| **tad** iti tasya mahā-dārḍhyaṁ dhvanitam \| yataḥ
**hāsasya prauḍhiṁ** prauḍhatvam **ajānantyā** iti \|
prema-pariṇāmo\'nurāgo hi svāśrayasya pratikṣaṇaṁ dainyam evāpādayati,
tataś ca \"nāham etad-yogyā ity ato\'nena tyaktaivāham\" iti
bhrānta-cittāyā ity arthaḥ \|\|25\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **tad** anirvacanīyam \|
**premaiva bandhanaṁ** śṛṅkhalā tat, iti tasya mahā-dārḍhyaṁ dhvanitam
\| yataḥ **priyāyāḥ**, ata eva **hāsya-prauḍhim** **ajānantyā**
vicārayitum anavagacchantyāḥ , sa mahā-kautuka-paro\'pi \| yad vā,
priya-jana-paravaśaḥ \| kiṁ ca, **karuṇaḥ** kṛpāluḥ, tatrāpi
**bhagavān** nijāśeṣa-guṇa-prakaṭana-paraḥ, yataḥ **kṛṣṇaḥ**
anirvacanīya-vicitra-māhātmyāmṛta-mahodadhiḥ \| kiṁ vā, ata eva
priya-jana-cittākarṣakaḥ, ato**\'nvakampata** \| yad vā, **karuṇaḥ**
svayam api rodanādinā nijānāṁ mūrta-karuṇa-rasaḥ san \|\|25\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : tad** anirvacanīyaṁ \|
**premaiva bandhanaṁ** śṛṅkhalā \| **tad** iti tasya mahā-dārḍhyaṁ
dhvanitaṁ \| kiṁ tu **hāsya-prauḍhim ajānantyā** ājanatyā vicārayitum
aśaknuvatyāḥ vāmyamaya-dvitīya-prema-bhedābhavāt \| sa
mahā-kautuka-paro\'py **anvakampata** \| yataḥ **karuṇaḥ** sarva-prāṇiṣu
dayāluḥ, kim uta tasyām iti bhāvaḥ \| yato **bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ**
tat-tan-mahā-guṇatvena atiprasiddhaḥ ity arthaḥ \|\|25\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** yathā sāṁsārika-jīvānām
avidyayā bandhanaṁ, tathā **tasyāḥ premṇā bandhanaṁ** yato **hāsyasya
prauḍhiṁ** prauḍhitvam **ajānantyā** iti prema-pariṇāmaḥ anurāgo hi
svāśrayasya pratikṣaṇaṁ dainyam evotpādayati \| \"tataś ca nāham etad
yogyā ity ato'nena tyaktaivāham\" iti bhrānta-cittāyā ity arthaḥ
\|\|25\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.26 \|\|**

**paryaṅkād avaruhyāśu tām utthāpya caturbhujaḥ \|**

**keśān samuhya tad-vaktraṁ prāmṛjat padma-pāṇinā \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : caturbhuja** iti
utthāpanāśleṣaṇa-vaktra-parimārjanādy-artham āviṣkṛta-caturbhuja ity
arthaḥ \| **samuhya** nibadhya \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : tāṁ** rukmiṇīm \| *ity
artha* iti tātparyam \| **tad-vaktraṁ** rukmiṇī-mukham \| anukampām
evāha---**paryaṅkād** iti tribhiḥ \| **utthāpya** bhūmitaḥ svāṅke
niveśyety arthaḥ \| **pra**karṣeṇa āvṛttyādinā **amṛjat** \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** **caturbhuja** iti \|
dvābhyāṁ parirebhe, dvābhyāṁ keśaṁ babandheti caturbhujatvam atraiva
śobhate sma \|\|26-28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** anukampām
evāha---**paryaṅkād** iti tribhiḥ \| **utthāpya** bhūmitaḥ svāṅke
niveśyety arthaḥ \| padmavat sarva-santāpaharaṇādi-guṇa-yuktena pāṇinā
**pra**karṣeṇa punaḥ punar āvṛtty-ādinā **amṛjat** \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** anukampām
evāha---**paryaṅkād** iti tribhiḥ \| **utthāpya** bhūmitaḥ svāṅke
niveśyety arthaḥ \| **prakarṣeṇa** āvṛtty-ādinā **amṛjat** \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tām utthāpya caturbhuja**
ity-ādi \| **caturbhuja** iti dvābhyāṁ parirebhe, dvābhyāṁ keśān
babandhety arthaḥ \| caturbhujas tadaivābhavad iti mantavyam \|
antaḥ-pure santataṁ dvibhujatvenaiva sthitatvāt \| caturbhujatvam
atraiva śobhate \|\|26\|\| (27-28)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : caturbhuja** iti
utthāpanāśleṣaṇa-vaktra-parimārjanārtham āviṣkṛta-bhuja-catuṣṭaya ity
arthaḥ \| **samūhya** nibadhya \|\|26\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.27-28\|\|**

**pramṛjyāśru-kale netre stanau copahatau śucā \|**

**āśliṣya bāhunā rājan ananya-viṣayāṁ satīm \|\|**

**sāntvayāmāsa sāntvajñaḥ kṛpayā kṛpaṇāṁ prabhuḥ \|**

**hāsya-prauḍhi-bhramac-cittām atad-arhāṁ satāṁ gatiḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : aśrukale** aśrubhiḥ śobhite \|
**śucā** śokāśrubhiḥ \| **sāntvayāmāsa** anunītavān \|\|27-28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : ananya-viṣayāṁ**
haṭha-prāpta-kṛṣṇām---

> viṣayo gocare deśe tathā janapade\'pi ca \|
>
> prabandhād yasya yo jñātas tatra rūpādike pūmān \|\| iti medinī \|

**atadarhām** evaṁ-vidha-hāsyāyogyām \| **pramṛjya** iti yugmakam \|
**prabhuḥ** **satīṁ** pātivratyādi-sad-guṇavatīṁ tāṁ **sāntvayāmāsa** \|
sāntvane hetuḥ---**satāṁ gatiḥ** \| sanmātrāṇāṁ svayam eva śaraṇaṁ, kim
uta tasyā ity āha---**ananya-viṣayām** ātmaikāśrayām \| tādṛśa-sāntvane
hetuḥ---**kṛpaṇāṁ** svopekṣā-mananena duḥkha-dīna-cittām \| tatra
hetuḥ---**hāsya-** iti \| tatra hetuḥ---**atadarhāṁ**
parama-sarala-svabhāvatvāt \|

nanu, tādṛśa-khedane jhaṭiti kathaṁ sāntvanaṁ syāt ?
tatrāha---**sāntvajñaḥ** sāntvanā-cāturya-paṇḍitaḥ \| tajjñatvam eva
vivṛṇoti---**pramṛjya** iti \| aśrūṇi kalayataḥ kṣarata ity
**aśru-kale** \| evaṁ tasya khedane sāntvane ca cāturīm anusmṛtya
sāścaryam ivāha---**prabhuḥ,** yadā yat karoti, tadā tatraiva samartha
ity arthaḥ \|\|27-28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** aśrūṇi kalayataḥ
pravahata ity atha kale, tad vā śravaṇena śokākulaṁ śrīparīkṣitaṁ
svasthayann āha---he **rājan** iti \| yad vā, a-kāra-praśleṣeṇa
arājamāno mahā mlānaḥ sann ity arthaḥ \| yato na vidyate\'**nyo viṣayo**
gatir yasyās tām, yataḥ **satīṁ** pativratām \| **bāhunā** ity ekatvaṁ
vyagratayekenāṅke grahaṇāt \| anyena netrayor apareṇa, stana-yojanāc ca
\| yad vā, prāg-ukta-nyāyena ekatve\'pi dvitvasya bahutvasya ca prāptyā
gāḍhāliṅganaṁ bodhayati \| **prabhuḥ** sāntvana-samarthaḥ, yataḥ sāntvaṁ
miṣṭa-vākyaṁ jānātīti, śaṅkayā vyākulaṁ cittaṁ yasyās tām, ato na tāṁ
hāsya-prauḍhim arhatīti tathā tām \| so\'pi tādṛśa-janeṣu tādṛśīṁ
hāsya-prauḍhiṁ kartuṁ nārhatīty āśayenāha---**satāṁ gatir** iti
\|\|27-28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : pramṛjya** iti yugmakam \|
**prabhuḥ satīṁ** pātivratyādi-sad-guṇavatīṁ tāṁ **sāntvayāmāsa** \|
sāntvane hetuḥ---**satāṁ gatiḥ** san-mātrāṇāṁ svayam eva śaraṇaṁ, kim
uta tasyā ity āha---**ananya-viṣayām** ātmaikāśrayāṁ \| tādṛśa-sāntvane
hetuḥ---**kṛpayā** \| tatra hetuḥ---**kṛpaṇāṁ** svopekṣā-mananena
duḥkha-dīna-cittām \| atra hetu---**hāsya-** iti \| tatra
hetuḥ---**atad-arhāṁ** parama-sarala-svabhāvatvāt \|\
\
nanu, tādṛśa-khedane jhaṭiti kathaṁ sāntvanaṁ syāt ?
tatrāha---**sāntvajñaḥ** sāntvanā-cāturye paṇḍitaḥ \| taj-jñatvam eva
vivṛṇoti---**pramṛjya** iti \| aśrūṇi kalayataḥ kṣarata iti
**aśru-kale** \| evaṁ tasya khedane sāntvane ca cāturīm anusmṛtya
sāścaryam ivāha---**prabhuḥ** yadā yat karoti tadā tatraiva samartha ity
arthaḥ \|\|27-28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : aśru-kale** aśru-dhare \|
**śucā** śokāśruṇā \|\|27-28\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.29 \|\|**

**śrī-bhagavān uvāca---**

**mā mā vaidarbhy asūyethā jāne tvāṁ mat-parāyaṇām \|**

**tvad-vacaḥ śrotu-kāmena kṣvelyācaritam aṅgane \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : mā mām** \| **tvad-vacaḥ** \"kiṁ
nu vadiṣyasi\" iti **śrotu-kāmena** śrotum icchatā **kṣvelyā** narmaṇā
evam **ācaritam** uktaṁ, na tattvataḥ \| he **aṅgane** ! sundari !
\|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : kṣvelir** narmaṇi hāse ca
iti niruktiḥ \| **mā** ity api yugmakam \| **mā mām** \|
**mābhyasūyethā** mayi doṣa-dṛṣṭiṁ mā kuru \|

nanv ananya-gatim api māṁ tyaktum icchasi kuto nābhyasūyā kāryā ?
tatrāha---**jāne** iti \| ataḥ kadācit kathañcid api na tyājyā iti
bhāvaḥ \|

nanu, tat kutas tādṛg uktaṁ ? tatrāha---**tvad-vaca** iti \|

nanu, tathāpi satyavacanena tvayā mithyā vaktuṁ na yujyate ?
tatrāha---**kṣvelyācaritam** iti \| narmasu tad yogyam ity arthaḥ \|
**aṅgane** ! parama-sundari ! iti stutiḥ \| aṅganāsv etad ucitam eveti
bhāvaḥ \| he **vaidarbhi** ! iti---viśiṣṭa-darbha-vanavāsibhir
mṛga-pakṣy-ādibhir iva tvayāpi tan na jñātam iti bhāvaḥ \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** **mā mā** iti
saṁśrayād vīpsā \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **māṁ mābhyasūyethā**
mayi doṣa-dṛṣṭiṁ mā kuru\| **mā**-śabdasya tatrāpy ādau prayogo
niṣedhasya dārḍhyārthaṁ, tat-prārthane vaiyagryāc ca \| nanu,
ananya-gatim api māṁ tyaktum icchasi, kuto\'sūyā na kāryā ?
tatrāha---**jāne** iti \| ataḥ kadācit kañcid api na tyājyaiveti bhāvaḥ
\| nanu, tat kutas tādṛg uktam ? tatrāha---**tvad-vacaḥ** iti \| nanu,
tathāpi satya-vacanena tvayā mithyā vaktuṁ na yujyate ?
tatrāha---**kṣvelyā** iti \| narmasu tadyogyam evety arthaḥ \| he
**aṅgane** ! iti sarvathā saundaryavatyā tvayā sundaram eva vaco
vaktavyam ity āśayeneti bhāvaḥ \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : mā mā** ity api yugmakam \|
**mā** māṁ **mā abhyasūyethāḥ** mayi doṣa-dṛṣṭiṁ mā kuru \| nanu
ananyagatim api māṁ tyaktum icchasi kuto\'sūyā na kāryā ?
tatrāha---**jāne** iti \| ataḥ kadācit kathañcid api na tyājyeti bhāvaḥ
\| nanu, tat kutas tādṛg uktaṁ ? tatrāha---**tvadvacaḥ** iti \| nanu,
tathāpi satya-vacanena tvayā mithyā vaktuṁ na yujyate ?
tatrāha---**kṣvelyā** iti, narmasu tadyogyam ity arthaḥ \| he **aṅgane**
! paramasundarāṅgīti stutiḥ \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) : mā mā** ity-ādi \| he
**vaidarbhi** ! **mā** māṁ **māsūyethāḥ** \| mayi asūyāṁ mā kṛthāḥ \|
yad vā, mā mā abhyasūyethā iti sambhramād vīpsā \| nanv evaṁ paruṣaṁ
vacas tvayābhihitaṁ, katham asūyātra na kāryā ? ity āha---**tvad-vacaḥ
śrotu-kāmena kṣvelyā** parihāsena etad **ācaritam**, na tu
**hṛt-kaṣāyeṇa** \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu, tvayā ced idaṁ
śarīraṁ tyaktaṁ, tarhi katham eṣa mahā-bhāro mayā voḍhavyaḥ ? ity ato
mayāpy etat tyajyate \| tatrāśleṣāśru-mārjanādinā kapaṭa-premāṇaṁ
prakaṭīkṛtya yat pratyūhaṁ vidhatse, tat kiṁ ? ato'py atiduḥkha-ditsā
punar api te vartate ! iti svasmin doṣāropaṇam āśaṅkyāha---**mā** iti \|

he **vaidarbhi** ! **mā** māṁ **mā asūyethāḥ** \| nanu ca hanta hanta
parama-kāruṇike tvayi mama neyam asūyā, kiṁ tu tvat-pārśve sthitvā
duḥkham eva prāpnuvatyāḥ mama hitārtham eva sukhamayīm anyāṁ gatiṁ yad
upadiṣṭavān asi tad ākarṇitavatyā mameyam ānanda-mūrcchaivābhūt \|
tad-bhaṅgaṁ ca tvaṁ kim akārṣīḥ ? sā yadi kṣaṇam aparam apy asthāsyat,
tadā mama tava ca paramaiva nirvṛttir abhaviṣyad iti tasyāḥ
sa-prema-vakroktim āśaṅkyāha---**tvāṁ** **mat-parāyaṇāṁ**
mad-ananya-gatim ahaṁ **jāne**, tarhi katham evaṁ durvākyam avocaḥ ?
tatrāha---**tvad-vacaḥ** kāṁ kāṁ vakroktiṁ vadiṣyatīti **śrotukāmena**
mayā **kṣvelyā** narmaṇaiva **ācaritam** \| evam uktaṁ na tu tattvataḥ
\| he **aṅgane** ! sundari \|\|29\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.30-31 \|\|**

**mukhaṁ ca prema-saṁrambha-sphuritādharam īkṣitum \|**

**kaṭākṣepāruṇāpāṅgaṁ sundara-bhru-kuṭī-taṭam \|\|**

**ayaṁ hi paramo lābho gṛheṣu gṛha-medhinām \|**

**yan narmair īyate yāmaḥ priyayā bhīru bhāmini \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : prema-saṁrambheṇa** praṇaya-kopena
**sphuritaḥ** kampito'**dharo** yasmiṁs tat \| **kaṭākṣās** tair
ākṣepair **aruṇāv apāṅgau** yasmiṁs tat \| ata eva **sundaraṁ** kuṭilaṁ
**bhrukuṭī-taṭaṁ** yasmiṁs tat \|\|30\|\|

nanu kalahe kiṁ kautukaṁ sukhaṁ vā ? ata āha---**ayaṁ hi** iti \|
**narmair** narmabhiḥ \| **yāmaḥ** kālaḥ \|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** eka-deśa-nyāyena
**kaṭa**-padaṁ kaṭākṣa-param \| narmokto prayojanāntaraṁ
cāha---**prema-saṁrambheṇa** iti tair vyākhyātam \| nanu, yadi
satya-kāmasya bhagavatas tathābhūtaivecchāsīt, tadā tadānīm eva rukmiṇī
sa-kopa-kuṭila-kaṭākṣā kathaṁ nābhūt ? iti cet, icchā-śaktir hi
bhagavata evādhīnā, premā tu taṁ bhagavantam apy adhīnīkarotīti
premṇo\'gre na tasyāḥ kāpi prabhaviṣṇutā \| premā hy ānanda-rūpam api
bhagavantam atiśayenānandayituṁ tad-icchām api kadācid anyathā karoti \|

idam atra tattvam---āsāṁ rukmiṇy-ādīnāṁ
madhura-prema-sneha-praṇaya-māna-rāgānurāgeṣu saptasu sthāyi-bhāveṣu
madhye kadācit kaścit svāvasaraṁ prāpyodayata iti \| atas tadānīṁ
vyajana-sevā-maye\'nurāgaḥ sthāyi-bhāva evodagāt \| tasya ca
dainya-sañcāri-prābalyāt tasyāḥ kheda-cintā-moha evābhūt, na tu tasmin
praṇaya-kopa-kaṭākṣādayaḥ \| te copariṣṭān māna-sthāyi-bhāvodaya-kṣaṇeṣu
bhaviṣyanty eva \| kiṁ ca, ghṛta-snehavatyā rukmiṇyā
māna-kauṭilyātiśayaḥ prāyo nodayate, madhu-snehavatyāḥ satyabhāmāyā
anurāgo\'pi māna-garbha eveti
saṁrambha-sakampādhara-kuṭila-kaṭākṣādi-mukhaṁ kṛṣṇasya tatraiva
sampadyata iti \|\|30 \|\|

**prema-saṁrambheṇa** praṇaya-kopena **sphuritaḥ** kampito'**dharo**
yasmiṁs tat \| **kaṭākṣās** tair ākṣepair **aruṇāv apāṅgau** yasmiṁs tat
\| ata eva **sundaraṁ** kuṭilaṁ **bhrukuṭī-taṭaṁ** yasmiṁs tat
\|\|30\|\|

nanu kalahe kiṁ kautukaṁ sukhaṁ vā ? ata āha---**ayaṁ hi** iti \|
**narmair** narmabhiḥ \| **yāmaḥ** kālaḥ \|\|31-32\|\|

*kautukam* adbhutam \| *yat* yaḥ \| ***narmas*** tu narmaṇā sāddham iti
dvirūpa-kośād ad-anto'pi narma-śabdaḥ \| ***yāmas*** tu prahare kāle iti
medinī \|

\[**toṣāṇī:**\] **hiṁ** yasmād **ayaṁ gṛheṣu** vartamānānāṁ
**gṛha-medhināṁ** gṛheṣu lābhaḥ phalaṁ sukham ity arthaḥ \| **gṛheṣu**
iti proṣitādīnāṁ tat-sukhaṁ niṣedhati---**yāma** eka-praharo'pi \|
**priyayā** iti sarvābhyo me tvam ativallabhā, atas tvayaiva saha etad
yujyata iti \| he **bhīru** ! iti---bhayamaya-dakṣiṇa-prema-svabhāvād
eva śaṅkāṁ vahasi, na tu vicāreṇeti bhāvaḥ \| atas tadānīm api
krodhāṁśānabhivyaktau sa-kautukaṁ tad-udbhāvanāya tam āropayati---he
**bhāmini** ! iti \| evaṁ mā mā vaidarbhy asūyethāḥ \[29\] ity api \|

atra śrī-bhagavataḥ sa-kautuko\'yam abhiprāyaḥ---iyaṁ khalu
sarala-premavatī parama-gāmbhīryavatīti tato mamābhīṣṭaḥ
priyā-kopa-vilāsaḥ prema-nibandha-prakāśaka-savikāra-kaṣṭokti-viśeṣo vā
nāsyāṁ sphuṭam upalabhyate, tasmāt kopa-vilāso vā taj-jananābhāve tu
dvitīyas tādṛśokti-viśeṣo vā yathā syāt prakāśeta, tathā bāḍhaṁ
parihāsena prayatiṣye \| tatra yasyāṁ kopa-janane bhrātṛ-vairūpyādikam
api kāraṇaṁ nāsīt tasyāṁ tatrānyat paramāyogyam eva \| kintv aham eva
mad-aviśleṣa-sukham evāsyāḥ sarvasvam iti tad-darpa-nyak-kāreṇaiva kopaḥ
sambhavet \| yadi tato'pi kopo nāvirbhavet, tathāpi mad-viśleṣa-bhayena
pūrvānurāgavad adhunāpi vikāra-viśeṣa-sahito nigadenaiva
prema-nirbandhaḥ prakāśyateti \| tatra rāja-putrīpsitā bhūpaiḥ \[10\]
ity-ādikasya tasya śrī-kṛṣṇa-vacanasya sa-praṇayatvaṁ parihāsa-mayatvaṁ
ca, tāṁ rūpiṇīm \[9\] iti, prītaḥ smayan \[9\] ity anena ca vyaktam \|
parihāsamayatvaṁ tu viśeṣato\'py uktaṁ prasaṅgena \| tasyāḥ
prema-sāralyādi-dvayam api tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavān \[25\] ity-ādinā \|

hāsyaṁ \[25\] parihāsaḥ \| tatra prauḍhiḥ \[25\] \"avaśyam enāṁ
sarala-premavatīm api gambhīrām api kṣobhayiṣyāmi\" iti garvaḥ \| tāṁ
praṇaya-rasa-kauṭilyābhāvena ajānatyā ity arthaḥ \| evamagre'pi
hāsya-prauḍha-bhramac-cittām \[28\] iti \| tatra tena parihāsena
kopa-vilāsādi-darśanam evābhīṣṭam iti svayam evoktam---mā mā vaidarbhi
\[29-31\] iti tribhiḥ \|

atha tasya tat-prema-nibandha-prakāśaka-vikāra-darśanecchāpi
prāktanenaiva vākyena vyaktā--- tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavān \[29\] ity-ādinā \|
tathā nigadanenaiva tad-vyakti-darśanecchāpi svayam eva
vyañjayiṣyate---sādhvy etac chrotu-kāmaiḥ \[49\] iti \| tathaiva ca
tasyā vākyam---jāḍyaṁ vacas tava gadāgraja \[40\] ity-ādi \| evaṁ
sva-darpa-nyakkāreṇa tat-kṣobho darśitaḥ \|

atha tad-aviśleṣa-nyakkāreṇa tat-kṣobho darśitaḥ \| tad-aviśeṣa-nyakkāre
śrī-śuka-vākyam---etāvad uktvā \[21\] ity-ādi \| anyasya tatra hetutvaṁ
bhagavataiva nirākariṣyate---bhrātur virūpa-karaṇam \[56\] ity-ādineti
\|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** kopāvilaṁ vaco\'pi na
śrutam, tad-darśana-śravaṇārtham idam uktam ity āha---**mukhaṁ ca**
ity-ādi \| **kaṭākṣe apāruṇaḥ,** atyantāruṇo\'pājo yatra,
apa-śabdo\'trādhikyārthaḥ \| he **bhīru** bhīta! he **bhāmini** kopane
\|\|30-31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tathāpy avācyaṁ tādṛśaṁ
duḥkha-pradaṁ vaco vaktuṁ na yujyate ? satyam, kiṁ tu
daihika-saundarya-viśeṣaṁ ca draṣṭum ity āha---**mukhaś ca** iti \|
samāsāntaḥ praviṣṭasyāpi **prema-saṁrambha**- ity asya parato\'py
ākarṣaḥ, tatraiva tat-tat-sampatteḥ, sphuritādharatvādīnāṁ yathottaraṁ
saundaryādhikye saṁrambha-lakṣaṇatve vā śraiṣṭhyam \| tādṛg-uktiṁ vinā
krodhānudayena tat-tat-saundaryānubhavāsiddher iti bhāvaḥ \|\|30 \|\|

**hi** eva \| **ayam** eva, **gṛheṣu** vartamānānāṁ **gṛha-medhināṁ**
pañca-yajñādi-gṛhastha-dharme dīkṣitānāṁ gṛhiṇāṁ vā, **lābhaḥ** phalaṁ
sukham ity arthaḥ \| **gṛheṣu** iti proṣitādīnām anya-prayojanasyāpy
apekṣyatvāt \| yad vā, gṛha-madhya ity arthaḥ, sabhādau tad-asambhavāt
\| **parama** iti viṣayāntara-bhogādinā sadyas tādṛk-sukhānutpatteḥ \|
**yāma** eka-praharo\'pi \| **priyayā** iti sarvābhyo me tvam
ativallabhā, atas tvayaiva saha etad yujyata iti \| he **bhīru** ! iti
sādhvītvena bhaya-svabhāvād eva śaṅkāṁ vahasi, na ca vicāreṇeti \| he
**bhāmini** ! iti ca praṇaya-kopa eva tvayā kartuṁ yujyate, na tv
īdṛśa-duḥkhādikam iti bhāvaḥ \|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : prema-saṁrambha-** iti
tṛtīyā-luk chāndasaḥ \| ataḥ **kaṭa**- ity-ādikayor apy anvayaḥ sarveṣām
eva viśeṣaṇānāṁ \| vacasi **mukhe** cānvayaḥ \|\|30 \|\|

**hi** yasmād **ayaṁ** **gṛheṣu** vartamānānāṁ **gṛha-medhināṁ** gṛhiṇāṁ
**lābhaḥ** phalaṁ sukham ity arthaḥ \| **gṛheṣu** iti proṣitādīnāṁ tu
tathā sukhaṁ niṣedhayati \| **yāmaḥ** eka-praharo'pi \| **priyayā** iti
sarvābhyo'pi me tvam ativallabhā, atas tvayaiva sahaitat yujyata iti \|
he **bhīru** ! iti bhaya-maya-dakṣiṇa-prema-svabhāvād eva śaṅkāṁ vahasi,
na tu vicāreṇeti bhāvaḥ \| atas tadānīm api krodhāṁśānabhivyaktī
sa-kautukaṁ tad-udbhāvanāya tam āropayati---he **bhāmini** ! iti \|

evaṁ mā mā vaidarbhy asūyethā \[25\] ity api \| atra śrī-bhagavataḥ
sa-kautuko\'yam abhiprāyaḥ---iyaṁ khalu sarala-premavatī
parama-gāmbhīryavatīti tato mamābhīṣṭaḥ priyā-kopa-vilāsaḥ
prema-nibandha-prakāśaka-savikāra-kaṣṭokti-viśeṣo vā nāsyāṁ sphuṭam
upalabhyate, tasmāt kopa-vilāso vā taj-jananābhāve tu dvitīyas
tādṛśokti-viśeṣo vā yathā syāṁ prakāśena, tathā bāḍhaṁ parihāsena
prayatiṣye \| tatra yasyāṁ kopa-janane bhrātṛ-vairūpyādikam api kāraṇaṁ
nāsīt tasyāṁ tatrānyat paramāyogyam eva \| kintv aham eva
mad-aviśleṣa-sukham eva cāsyāḥ sarvasvam iti tad-darpa-nyak-kāreṇaiva
kopaḥ sambhavet \| yadi tato'pi kopo nāvirbhavet, tathāpi
mad-viśleṣa-bhayena pūrvānurāgavad adhunāpi vikāra-viśeṣa-sahito
nigadenaiva prema-nirbandhaḥ prakāśyateti \|

tatra rāja-putrīpsitā bhūpaiḥ \[10\] ity-ādikasya tasya
śrī-kṛṣṇa-vacanasya sa-praṇayatvaṁ sa-parihāsa-mayatvaṁ ca, tāṁ rūpiṇīm
\[9\] ity-ādau, prītaḥ smayan \[9\] ity antena ca vyaktam \|
parihāsamayatvaṁ tu viśeṣato\'py uktaṁ prasaṅgena \| tasyāḥ
prema-sāralyādi-dvayam api tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavān \[25\] ity-ādinā \|

hāsyaṁ \[25\] parihāsaḥ \| tatra prauḍhiḥ \[25\] \"avaśyam enāṁ
sarala-premavatīm api gambhīrām api kṣobhayiṣyāmi\" iti garvaḥ \| tāṁ
praṇaya-rasa-kauṭilyābhāvena ajānatyā ity arthaḥ \| evam agre'pi
hāsya-prauḍha-bhramac-cittām \[28\] iti \| tatra tena parihāsena
kopa-vilāsādi-darśanam evābhīṣṭam iti svayam evoktam---mā mā vaidarbhi
\[29-31\] iti tribhiḥ \|

atha tasya tat-prema-nibandha-prakāśaka-vikāra-darśanecchāpi
prāktanenaiva vākyena vyaktā--- tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavān \[29\] ity-ādinā \|
tathā nigadanenaiva tad-vyakti-darśanecchāpi svayam eva
vyañjayiṣyate---sādhvy etac chrotu-kāmaiḥ \[49\] iti \| tathaiva ca
tasyā vākyam---jāḍyaṁ vacas tava gadāgraja \[40\] ity-ādi \| evaṁ
sva-darpa-nyakkāreṇa tat-kṣobho darśitaḥ \|

atha tad-aviśleṣa-darpa-nyakkāreṇa tat-kṣobho darśitaḥ \|
tad-aviśeṣa-nyakkāre śrī-śuka-vākyam---etāvad uktvā \[21\] ity-ādi \|
anyasya tatra \[tu\] hetutvaṁ śrī-bhagavataiva nirākariṣyate---bhrātur
virūpa-karaṇam \[56\] ity-ādineti \|\|31\|\|

\[*prīti-sandarbhasya 386-anucchedo draṣṭavyaḥ, tathā cātra
10.60.10-śloko\'pi draśṭavyaḥ*.\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tadānīm api krodhāṁśānabhivyaktau
sa-kautuka-tadanāya tam āropi---he bhāminīti \| evaṁ mā māṁ
vaidarbhyasūyethāḥ \[bhā.pu. 10.60.29\] ity api na tvevam \|\|31-34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** nanv evaṁ parihāsaḥ kiṁ
buddhimatā kriyate ? ity āha---mukhaṁ ca prema-saṁrambha-sphuritādharam
īkṣitum \| tava kopo na mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kadācid api, tadāvalamba-vaco na
śrutam iti tathā vihitam ity arthaḥ \| **kaṭākṣe apāruṇaḥ** apāṅgo
yatra, apa-śabdo'trādhikyārthaḥ, avyayānām anekārthatvāt \| he **bhīru**
bhīte ! \|\|30\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** narmoktau prayojanāntaraṁ
cāha---**prema-saṁrambheṇa** praṇaya-kopena **sphuritaḥ**
kampito'**dharo** yatra tat \| **kaṭā-**śabdena **kaṭākṣāḥ,** tair
**ākṣepe** **aruṇāv apāṅgau** yasmin, ata eva **sundaraṁ** kuṭīlaṁ
**bhrūkuṭi-taṭaṁ** yasmin, tac **ca** tat **mukham** **īkṣituṁ** ca \|

nanu, yadi satya-kāmasya bhagavatas tathā-bhūtaivecchā āsīt, tadā
tadānīm eva rukmiṇī sa-kopa-kuṭila-kaṭākṣā kathaṁ nābhūt ? iti cet
ucyate---icchā-śaktir hi bhagavata evādhīnā \| premā tu taṁ bhagavantam
apy adhīnīkarotīti premṇāgreṇa tasyāḥ kāpi prabhaviṣṇutā premā hi
ānanda-rūpam api bhagavantam atiśayenānandayituṁ tad-icchām api kadācid
anyathā karoti \| idam atra tattvam---āsāṁ rukmiṇy-ādīnāṁ
madhura-prema-rasavatīnāṁ rati-prema-sneha-praṇaya-māna-rāgānurāgeṣu
saptasu sthāyi-bhāveṣu madhye kadācit kaścit svāvasaraṁ prāpyodayate ity
atas tadānīṁ vyajana-sevā-samaye anurāgaḥ sthāyi-bhāva evodagāt \| tasya
ca dainya-sañcāri-prābalyāt tasyāḥ kheda-cintā moha evābhūt, na tu
tasmin praṇaya-kopa-kaṭākṣādayaḥ \| te copariṣṭān
māna-sthāyi-bhāvodaya-kṣaṇeṣu bhaviṣyanty eva \| kiṁ ca,
ghṛta-snehavatyā rukmiṇyā māna-kauṭilyātiśayaḥ prāyo nodayate \|
madhu-snehavatyāḥ satyabhāmāyās tu anurāgo'pi māna-garbha eveti
saṁrambha-sakampādhara-kuṭila-kaṭākṣādi-sukhaṁ kṛṣṇasya
tatraivābhisampadyata iti \|\|30\|\|

nanu, mat-kṛtayā vyajanādi-paricaryayā duḥkhaṁ labhase, kiṁ tu tāṁ
parityaktavatyā mama kaṭhora-kopoktyaiva sukhaṁ labhase \| aparaṁ ca
priyāyā mama saharṣa-sotphullaṁ mukhaṁ tvan-nayanābhyāṁ na rocate, kintv
atiduḥkha-rukṣaṁ kopa-vivarṇīkṛtaṁ rasa-pratikūlaṁ bhru-kuṭi-bhīṣaṇaṁ
mukham eva rocata \| iti ko'yaṁ te svabhāvaḥ ? tatrāha---**ayam** iti
\|\|31\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.32-33\|\|**

**śrī-śuka uvāca---**

**saivaṁ bhagavatā rājan vaidarbhī parisāntvitā \|**

**jñātvā tat-parihāsoktiṁ priya-tyāga-bhayaṁ jahau \|\|**

**babhāṣa ṛṣabhaṁ puṁsāṁ vīkṣantī bhagavan-mukham \|**

**sa-vrīḍa-hāsa-rucira-snigdhāpāṅgena bhārata \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : bhagavatas** tasya aiśvarya-yuktaṁ
**mukhaṁ** **sa-vrīḍena hāsena rucireṇa snigdhenāpāṅgena vīkṣamāṇā**
\|\|33\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : sā** vaidarbhī \| **tasya**
kṛṣṇasya **parihāsa-vacanam**\| **vaidarbhī** tādṛśānurāgeṇa vidarbhād
āgatā vā \| **priyeṇa** tena yas **tyāgaḥ** svasya tyājanaṁ, tasmād
**bhayam** \|\|32\|\|

**puṁsām ṛṣabham** iti sarva-saundarya-vaidagdhyādikam uktam \| ato
**bhagavad** iti \| svenaiva susnigdha-smita-śrama-jalādinā ca śrīmat,
ata eva **vi**śeṣeṇa **īkṣamāṇā** \| kena ?
**sa-vrīḍa-hāsa-rucira-snigdhāpāṅgena** \| tatra **vrīḍā**-pūrvaṁ
hāsya-prauḍhi-jñānāśakteḥ, **hāsaḥ** samprati hāsya-prauḍhānusandhānāt,
vrīḍā-sahitena hāsena ruciraḥ snigdhaś ca prema-rasārdro yo\'pāṅgaḥ,
tena, itīkṣaṇa-viśeṣo'pi darśitaḥ \| evaṁ ca paramottamayos tayoḥ
prema-saṁvādo mahāvaṁśa-yaśaskara-guṇatvāt tvam eva boddhum arhasīti \|
atas tatra mano nidhehīty āha---**bhārata** iti \|\|33\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) : puṁsām ṛṣabhaṁ**
puruṣottamaṁ **mukhaṁ vīkṣatī** nirīkṣamāṇā, **mukhaṁ**
viśinaṣṭi---bhagavat śrīmat, bhagaṁ śrī-kāma-māhātmyam, anyathā
**bhagavan-mukhaṁ** vīkṣya **puṁsām ṛṣabhaṁ** **babhāṣa** iti viruddhaṁ
syāt \|\|33\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **bhagavatā**
sarva-śaktimatā, ataḥ **pari** sarvato-bhāvena **sāntvitā** satī, yato
**vaidarbhī** kanyātve\'pi tad-arthaṁ tyakta-sarvārthā iti \| yad vā,
parama-vaidagdhyā tattvaṁ boddhuṁ samartheti bhāvaḥ \| atas tasya tāṁ vā
tena prāg-uktāṁ sarvāṁ **parihāsenaivoktiṁ** **jñātvā** **priyeṇa** tena
yas **tyāgaḥ** svasya tyajanaṁ, tasmād **bhayam** \| yad vā, bhaya-tyāge
hetuḥ---**vaidarbhī**, na ca maithilīti taj-janmany eva tat-sambhavāt \|

nanu, tathāpi tasmin viśvasituṁ nārhati ? iti, tatrāha---**bhagavān**
iti \| śrī-raghunāthatve prāya ārya-dharmo darśitaḥ, adhunā ca
bhakta-vātsalyādi-sarva-sadguṇa-prakaṭanāt tādṛktvaṁ na sambhaved iti
bhāvaḥ \| he **rājan** ! iti ca aho tayāpi tasmāt tādṛśa-bhayaṁ
prāpyate, katham anyena viśvāsaḥ kāryaḥ ? iti praṇayoktiḥ \|\|32\|\|

**puṁsām ṛṣabham** iti---sarva-saundarya-vaidagdhyādikam uktam \| ataḥ
śrī-**bhagavataḥ** śramādi-jāta-prasveda-kaṇikādinā snigdha-hāsādinā ca
śrīmataḥ, ity antaḥ-prasādaḥ sūcitaḥ \| ata eva **vīkṣamāṇā** \| kena ?
**sa-vrīḍa-hāsa-rucira-snigdhāpāṅgena** \| tatra vrīḍā
hāsya-prauḍhi-jñānāśakteḥ \| kiṁ vā, sādhvī-svabhāvād bhāva-viśeṣād vā
hāso hāsya-prauḍhānusandhānāt, antaḥ-prasādodayād vā, bhāva-viśeṣād eva
vā, vrīḍā-sahitena hāsena ruciraś ca snigdhaś ca prema-rasārdro
yo\'pāṅgaḥ teneti \| **vīkṣamāṇā** iti vi-śabdārtho\'pi darśitaḥ \| evaṁ
tasyā api parama-vaidagdhyādikam uktam \| tena ca dvayor api
paramottamatvādinā vakṣyamāṇārthasya paratamatvaṁ sūcitam \| tac ca
mahāvaṁśajatvāt paramottamas tvam eva boddhum arhasīti \| atas tatra
mano nidhehīty āha---he **bhārata** iti \|\|33\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ):** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : vaidarbhī** tādṛśānurāgeṇa
vidarbhād āgatā yā \| **priyeṇa** tena yas **tyāgaḥ** svasya tyajanaṁ,
tasmād **bhayam** \|\|32\|\|

**puṁsām ṛṣabham** iti sarva-saundarya-vaidagdhyādikam uktam \| ato
**bhagavad** iti svenaiva susnigdha-smita-śrama-jalādinā ca śrīmat, ata
eva viśeṣeṇekṣamāṇā \| kena ? **sa-vrīḍa-hāsa-rucira-snigdhāpāṅgena,**
tatra **vrīḍā** pūrva-hāsya-prauḍhi-jñānāśakteḥ **hāsaḥ** samprati
hāsya-prauḍhy-anusandhānāt vrīḍā-sahitena hāsena **ruciraś** ca
**snigdhaś** ca prema-rasārdro yo\'pāṅgaḥ, tena īkṣaṇa-viśeṣo'pi
darśitaḥ \| eṣa ca paramottamayoḥ tayoḥ
prema-saṁvāda-mahāvaṁśa-yaśaskara-guṇatvāt tvam eva boddhum arhasi ity
atas tatra mano nidhehīty āha---**bhārata** iti \|\|33\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.34 \|\|**

**śrī-rukmiṇy uvāca---**

**nanv evam etad aravinda-vilocanāha**

**yad vai bhavān bhagavato'sadṛśī vibhūmnaḥ \|**

**kva sve mahimny abhirato bhagavāṁs try-adhīśaḥ**

**kvāhaṁ guṇa-prakṛtir ajña-gṛhīta-pādā \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

asamatvaṁ bhayaṁ durgāśrayaṇaṁ prabalaiḥ kaliḥ \|

arājatvam avijñātālaukikehāvasādanam \|\|

niṣkiñcanatvaṁ tat-prītir āḍhyānādaraṇīyatā \|

anaucityaṁ nirguṇatvaṁ vṛthā-ślāghā ca bhikṣubhiḥ \|\|

audāsīnyam akāmatvaṁ sva-doṣān ṣoḍaśāsataḥ \|

ajñatvādīrgha-darśitve bhaimyā rājñāṁ bahūn guṇān \|

kṛṣṇe narmoditān bhaiṣmī nyaṣedhat tad-guṇa-stavaiḥ \|\|

bhagavatā sva-nindā-parāṇīva yāni vacanāny uktāni tāni
sarvotkarṣa-paratayā vyācakṣāṇā pratibhāṣate sma, tatra yad uktaṁ,
kasmān no vavṛṣe'samān \[bhā.pu. 10.60.11\] iti tatrāsāmyaṁ satyam evety
āha---**nanv evam** iti \| he **aravinda-vilocana**, **try-adhīśas**
trayāṇāṁ brahmādīnām apy adhīśo niyantā tvaṁ **kva** ? **kva cāhaṁ**
guṇa-prakṛtis triguṇa-svabhāvā prākṛtā guṇamayī prakṛtir vā \| nanu tvam
evādhīśvarī śrīḥ sarvair upāsyatvād iti ced ata āha---**ajñaiḥ**
sakāmair **gṛhītau pādau** yasyāḥ sā \|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *asamatvam* atulyatvam \|
*avijñātaṁ* cālaukikaṁ ca *avijñātālaukike* te ca te *īhe*
cāvijñātālaukike \| he te ca *avasādanaṁ* caiteṣāṁ samāhāro
vijñātālaukikehāvasānam, tathā cāvijñātehālaukikehāvasādanaṁ ceti trayam
\| **tat-prītir** niṣkiñcana-prītiḥ \| *anaucityam* aucityābhāvaḥ \|
*asato*\'vidyamānān \| *bhaiṣmyā* dvau doṣo \| *tad-guṇa-stavaiḥ*
kṛṣṇa-guṇa-kathanaiḥ \| te doṣā eva guṇās tad-guṇā itiva \| tatra teṣu
*ṣoḍaśasu*, tatrety uktārtham eva \|\|

**yad bhavān āha**, **tad evam** eva \| **nanu** evārthe \| samo na
tvayeti kathaṁ ? **vibhūmno** deśa-kāla-vastu-pariccheda-sahitasya
vyāptasya bhavataḥ **sadṛśo** nāstīti, kiṁ tu **bhavān** eva
bhavat-samaḥ, rāma-rāvaṇayor yuddhaṁ rāma-rāvaṇayor iva itivat \|
mat-sadṛśī tvam iti cen nety āha---**kva** ? iti \|

nanu, brahmādayo mat-sadṛśā eva ? iti ced, āha---**adhīśa** iti \|
triguṇa-svabhāvatve vailakṣaṇyāsiddher āha---prākṛta-**guṇa**mayī
svābhāvika-guṇa-vikārā \| **prakṛtir** mūla-kāraṇaṁ, **guṇānām** ity
arthaḥ \| atrākṣipati bhagavān---*nanv* iti \| *ity ata* ity atra \|
**ajña**- iti---vidvāṁsas tu māṁ tyaktvaiva tvām upāsata iti bhāvaḥ \|

\[**toṣaṇī:** \] atra ṭīkā-padyeṣu *avijñāta*- ity-ādinā doṣa-trayam
*avijñātehā* ca *laukikehā* ca *avasādanaṁ* ca iti \| **bhavataḥ
sadṛśī** **nāham** iti yad bhavān āha---etad evaṁ satyam evety arthaḥ \|
kiṁ tu bhavata iti vaktavye **bhagavata** iti gauravāt \| **vai**
vyaktam \|

**nanu** niścitam \| kutaḥ ? **vibhūmnaḥ**,
anantādbhuta-māhātmya-paripūrṇasya \| aravindād api viśiṣṭa-locaneti
saundaryeṇāpi **na sadṛśī** iti bhāvaḥ \| asadṛśītvam eva
vyañjayati---**kva** ? iti \| **sve mahimni** iti svarūpam eva mahimā
parama-praśaṁsā-hetuḥ, paramānanda-rūpatvāt tasminn ity arthaḥ \| tādṛśe
tatra **abhi** sarvato-bhāvena, yato **bhagavān** sarvotkṛṣṭa-pade
vartate, ahaṁ tu **guṇā** jāḍyādi-doṣa-yuktās tamaḥ-paryantā trayaḥ \|
**prakṛtiḥ** svarūpaṁ yasyāḥ sā \| **kva** sarva-nikṛṣṭa-pade varte\'to
mahad evāntaram iti bhāvaḥ \| evaṁ svarūpa-gate gaurava-lāghave darśite
\|

aiśvarya-gate apy āha---**trayāṇāṁ** guṇānāṁ brahmādīnāṁ vā **īśa**
ārādhyaḥ puruṣaḥ, tasyāpy uparīśo bhagavān **adhīśaḥ**, ahaṁ tv
**ajñais** tvad-bahirmukhair **gṛhītā** āśritāḥ **pādā** aṁśāḥ
sattvādi-vaibhava-rūpā yasyāḥ, sā, tat-sārāṁśa-jagal-lakṣmītve\'py
**ajñair** indrādibhir evāśrito **pādau** caraṇe yasyāḥ sā ity
arthāntara-vyaktir iti svasya svarūpa-śaktitve\'pi
nijāṁśābhāsa-māyā-śaktitvenopanyāso dainyeneva, ṭīkāyāṁ prathamārthavat
\| ato vāstavārthe dainyaṁ yathā **sve** svīye **mahimni** [kā
kadā]{.mark} sarvajñatvādi-rūpa-saundarya-sāmarthyādi-rūpe
vaibhave\'**bhirato** **bhagavān kva** ? **kva vāhaṁ**
svarūpa-bhūtatve\'pi śaktitvena śaktimattvāpekṣayā gauṇī **prakṛtir**
yasyāḥ sā, tathā trayāṇām tripād-vyāptiḥ pare dhāmni anityaṁ pādam
aiśvaram iti pādmottara-khaṇḍānusāreṇa
vaikuṇṭha-gata-tripād-vibhūti-rūpāyāṁ sarvoparīśvaro bhagavān **kva** ?
**kva cāham** asya viṣṇos tava jñair jñātṛbhir eva **gṛhītau pādau**
yasyāḥ sā, tvan-mahimānugati-mātra-siddha-tat-tad-aiśvaryety arthaḥ \|

atha dainyaṁ vināpi vāstavārthe tat-tad-uttaram---yathaivam evambhūto
bhagavān kva kutrānyatra vartate ? kiṁ tu sarvadā \| mamāśrayatvenaiva
vartate, ahaṁ kva kutrānyatra ? kiṁ tu sarvadā tvad-āśritatvenaiva
varte, tathā guṇā bhavata aiśvaryādaya eva prakṛtiḥ svarūpaṁ yasyāḥ sā
\| ata eva na vidyate jñaḥ paṇḍito yebhyas tair gṛhīta-pādeti \| evaṁ
katham asamatvaṁ ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ \|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** **nanv** **evam**
ity-ādi \| **nanu**, bhoḥ! **evam etad** yad uktaṁ tad eva, kintv
artho\'nya iti prapañcayati---tvaṁ **tryadhīśaḥ**, trayāṇāṁ guṇānām
adhīśo niyantā guṇātītaḥ, **ahaṁ** **guṇa-prakṛtiḥ** \| tvaṁ **sve
mahimni** ānande **abhirataḥ** \| aham **ajña-gṛhīta-pādā** iti śrīr apy
ahaṁ na tava yogyā iti satyam eva, kiṁ tu tavaitad vaktuṁ na yogyam, na
hy uttamaḥ svaṁ mahimānaṁ prakaṭayati \| rājaputri \[bhā.pu. 10.60.10\]
iti sambodhana-janite kope svarūpa-sphūrtyā pratyuttaram \|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **bhavataḥ sadṛśī** nāham
iti **yad bhavān āha** \| pāṭhāntare\'pi sa evārthaḥ, kintu bhavata iti
vaktavye **bhagavata** iti gaurava-bhavāt \| **vai** vyaktam\| **nanu**
niścitam \| **evam etat** satyam evety arthaḥ \| kutaḥ ?
**vibhūmno**\'nantādbhuta-māhātmya-paripūrṇasya, **aravindād** api
**vi**śiṣṭa-**locana** iti saundaryeṇāpi na sadṛśīti bhāvaḥ \| tat tad
evābhivyañjayati---**kva** iti \| **sve**\'sādhāraṇe **mahimni**
nijānande\'bhito rataḥ, yato **bhagavān** sākṣāt parameśvaraḥ, ata eva
**adhīśaḥ**, ahaṁ viṣaya-sukhādy-apekṣikā strī \| evaṁ tasya trayāṇāṁ
viśeṣaṇānāṁ viruddhārthatvena yathā-saṅkhyaṁ vyākhyeyam \| yad vā,
**bhagavān** iti pūrvavad **bhavān** ity arthaḥ \| tataś ca tasya dvayor
viśeṣaṇayor virodhenāsyā viśeṣaṇa-dvayam \| anyat tair vyākhyātam \|

yad vā, **sve mahimni** ekasminn eva karmaṇi yugapal
laukikatvaiśvaryayor yogena pūrva-pūrvato māhātmya-viśeṣe\'**bhiratas**
tat-prakaṭana-paraḥ \| tathā coktaṁ śrī-brahmaṇā dvitīya-skandhe karmāṇi
ātma-mahimopanibandhanāni \[bhā.pu. 2.7.26\] iti \| tac ca pūrvaṁ
vyākhyātam eva \| tat sambhāvayati---yato **bhagavān**
anantādbhuta-śakti-yukta iti \| atas **trayāṇām**
adho-madhyordhva-lokānām **adhīśaḥ**, ahaṁ
dakṣiṇaika-deśa-vidarbha-rāja-kanyā \| kiṁ ca, sva-**guṇaiḥ** prakṛtir
iva **prakṛtir** jaḍety arthaḥ \|

nanu, tarhi kṛtair loka-pāla-vibhūtibhir bhūpaiḥ prārthitā, vicārābhāvāt
? ity āha---**ajña**- iti \| ity ātmano\'**jña**-janādhīśatā paramājñatā
ca sūcitā \| evam utkrameṇa virodho vitarkyaḥ \|

yad vā, pūrvavat tasya viśeṣaṇābhyāṁ krameṇaivāsyā viśeṣaṇayor virodhaḥ
\| tathā hi, **kva sve mahimny abhirataḥ**, **kva guṇa-prakṛtiḥ**, kva
sarva-lokānām apīśvaraḥ, kva bhavan-mahimānabhijñaiḥ kṣudraiḥ sevyājñā
iti dik \|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** atra ṭīkā-padyeṣu *avijñāta*-
ity-ādinā doṣa-trayam *avijñātehā* ca *laukikehā* ca *avasādanaṁ* ca iti
\| **bhavataḥ sadṛśī** **nāham** iti yad bhavān āha---etad evaṁ satyam
evety arthaḥ \| kiṁ tu bhavata iti vaktavye **bhagavata** iti gauravāt
\| **vai** vyaktam \|

**nanu** niścitaṁ \| kutaḥ ? **vibhūmnaḥ,**
anantādbhuta-māhātmya-guṇa-saundaryādi-paripūrṇasya **aravindād** api
**vi**śiṣṭa-**locana**- iti bhavad-ekāṅga-saundaryeṇāpi na **sadṛśī,**
kim uta sarvāṅga-saundaryeṇāpi na sadṛśī, kim uta sarvāṅga-saundaryeṇeti
bhāvaḥ \|

asadṛśītvam eva vyañjayati---**kva** ? iti \| **sve mahimni** iti
svarūpam eva mahimā parama-praśaṁsā-hetuḥ paramānanda-rūpatvāt tasminn
ity arthaḥ \| tādṛśe tatra **abhi** sarvato-bhāvena, yato **bhagavān**
sarvotkṛṣṭa-pade vartate, ahaṁ tu **guṇā** jāḍyādi-doṣa-yuktās
tamaḥ-paryantā trayaḥ \| **prakṛtiḥ** svarūpaṁ yasyāḥ sā \| **kva**
sarva-nikṛṣṭa-pade varte\'to mahad evāntaram iti bhāvaḥ \| evaṁ
svarūpa-gate gaurava-lāghave darśite \|

aiśvarya-gate apy āha---**trayāṇāṁ** guṇānāṁ brahmādīnāṁ vā īśaḥ
ārādhyaḥ puruṣaḥ, tasyāpy uparīśo bhagavān **adhīśaḥ** \| ahaṁ tv
**ajñais** tvad-bahirmukhair eva **gṛhītāḥ** āśritāḥ **pādā** aṁśāḥ
sattvādi-vaibhava-rūpā yasyāḥ sā \| tat-sārāṁśa-jagal-lakṣmītve'pi
**ajñair** indrādibhir evāśritau **pādau** caraṇe yasyāḥ sā ity
arthāntara-vyaktiḥ iti svasya svarūpa-śaktitve'pi
nijāṁśābhāsa-māyā-śaktitvena upanyāso dainyenaiva, ṭīkāyāḥ
prathamārthavat \| **tryadhīśa** ity asya ṭīkāyāṁ śrī-śiva-śrī-brahmaṇor
iva bhagavataḥ śrī-viṣṇor api śrī-kṛṣṇa-niyāmyatvaṁ sphuṭam evāṅgīkṛtam
\| ato vāstavārthe dainyaṁ yathā **sve** svīye **mahimni**
[kākasya]{.mark} sarvajñādi-rūpa-saundarya-sāmarthyādi-rūpe ca
vaibhave\'**bhirato bhagavān kva** ? **kva cāhaṁ** ? svarūpa-bhūtatve'pi
śaktitvena śaktimattvād apekṣayā **gauṇī prakṛtir** yasyāḥ sā \|

tathā trayāṇāṁ tripād-vyāptiḥ pare dhāmni anityaṁ pādam aiśvaram
\[padma-pu. 6\] iti pādmottara-khaṇḍānusāreṇa
vaikuṇṭha-gata-tripād-vibhūti-rūpāṇāṁ sarvoparīśvaro bhagavān kva ? kva
vāham asya viṣṇos tava **jñair** jñātṛbhir eva **gṛhītau pādau** yasyāḥ
sā \| tvan-mahimānugati-mātra-siddha-tat-tad-aiśvaryety arthaḥ \|

atha dainyaṁ vināpi vāstavārthe tat-tad-uttaraṁ---yathā evam evam-bhūto
bhagavān kva kutrānyatra vartate ? kiṁ tu sarvadā mamāśrayatvenaiva
vartate ahaṁ ca kūtrānyatra kiṁ tu sarvadā tadāśritatvenaiva varte tathā
guṇā bhavata aiśvaryādaya eva prakṛtiḥ svarūpaṁ yasyāḥ sā\| ata eva na
vidyate jñaḥ paṇḍito yebhyaḥ, tair gṛhīta-pādeti evaṁ katham asamatvaṁ
ghaṭate ? iti bhāvaḥ \|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** kiṁ babhāṣe ? ity
āha---**nanv evam** ity-ādi \| **nanu,** bho **aravinda-vilocana** !
**yad bhavān āha**, tad evam etat kathaṁ no vavṛṣe'samān \[bhā.pu.
10.60.11\] iti yad uktam, tat satyam eva \| bhavataḥ sadṛśī na bhavāmy
eva, yatas tvaṁ **try-adhīśaḥ**, trayāṇāṁ guṇānāṁ niyantā guṇātīta iti
yāvat \| **ahaṁ** **guṇa-prakṛtir** guṇāḥ prakṛtayo yasyāḥ,
guṇa-svabhāvety arthaḥ \| tvaṁ **sve mahimni** svānande
nitya-paripūrṇa-bhāve'**bhirataḥ**, aham **ajña-gṛhīta-pādā** \| ato'ham
asadṛśy eva, atyantāsambhāvanāyāṁ **kva**-dvayam \| atas tvaṁ satya-vāg
eva \| iti lakṣmītva-sphūrtāv api dainyam evāsyāḥ \| iti garva-garbhaṁ
dainyam \| kiṁ ca, tavaitad uktam anucitam, na hy uttamaḥ svaṁ mahimānaṁ
prakaṭayati sotprāsa-pratyuttaraṁ ca \|\|34\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** bhagavatā yena yena
vākyena svasyāpakarṣaḥ rukmiṇyā utkarṣaś coktaḥ, tad eva vākyam
anuvadantī rukmiṇī tad-viparyayaṁ vyācaṣṭe \| tatra yad uktaṁ---kasmān
no vavṛṣe'samān \[bhā.pu. 10.60.11\] iti, tatrāsāmyaṁ satyam evety
āha---he **aravinda-vilocana** ! yad bhavān āha---kasmān no vavṛṣe'samān
\[bhā.pu. 10.60.11\] iti tat \|

**nanu** niścitam **evam etat** satyam evety arthaḥ \| **sve** svīye
**mahimni** ṣaḍaiśvarya-lakṣaṇe **abhirato** **bhagavān try-adhīśaḥ** \|
triguṇa-niyantā bhagavān **kva**, **ahaṁ guṇa-prakṛtir** jaḍā niyamyā vā
kva ? iti tvatto'tinikṛṣṭāyā mama kutas tvat-sāmya-sambhāvanāpīti bhāvaḥ
\| **guṇa-prakṛtir** bahiraṅga-śaktis tasyāḥ svāṁśatvāt, svasya
tat-svarūpatva-mananam atidainyād eva \|\|34\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.35 \|\|**

**satyaṁ bhayād iva guṇebhya urukramāntaḥ**

**śete samudra upalambhana-mātra ātmā \|**

**nityaṁ kadindriya-gaṇaiḥ kṛta-vigrahas tvaṁ**

**tvat-sevakair nṛpa-padaṁ vidhutaṁ tamo'ndham \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** yad uktaṁ rājabhyo bibhyataḥ
subhrūḥ samudraṁ śaraṇaṁ gatān \[bhā.pu. 10.60.12\] iti
tatrāha---**satyam** iti \| he **urukrama** ! iti bhayābhāvaṁ
darśayati---**guṇāḥ** śabdādaya eva rājanta iti rājānaḥ, tebhyo **bhayād
iva** iti \| **antar** hṛdaye **samudre** tadvad agādhe viṣayākārair
aparicchinna ity arthaḥ \| **śete** niścalatayā prakāśate \|
**upalambhana-mātraś** caitanya-dhana **ātmā** bhavān iti \| balavadbhiḥ
kṛta-dveṣān \[bhā.pu. 10.60.12\] iti yad uktaṁ tad api satyam ity
āha---**nityam** iti \| **kadindriya-gaṇaiḥ** kutsitair bahirmukhair
indriya-gaṇaiḥ \| vṛtty-abhiprāyeṇa bahu-vacanam \| kutsita indriya-gaṇo
yeṣām iti vā \| tais tvaṁ **nityaṁ** **kṛta-vigrahaḥ**, teṣu
tavāpratīteḥ \| yad uktaṁ, tyakta-nṛpāsanān \[bhā.pu. 10.60.12\] iti tad
api yuktam evety āha---**tvat-sevakair** iti \| **nṛpāṇāṁ padam** āsanam
**andhaṁ** gāḍhaṁ **tama** eva tat \| aviveka-bahulatvāt \|
tvat-sevakair eva tat tyaktaṁ kiṁ punar vaktavyaṁ tvayā tyaktam iti
\|\|35\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** yena
pāda-nyāsenātibala-daityānīka-pater baleḥ pṛthivī gṛhītā, tasya kuto
bhayam iti sambuddhy-abhiprāyaḥ \| *ity artha* iti---samudravad
agādhāntaḥ-karaṇaṁ viṣayākāra-taraṅgair na paricchidyata iti bhāvaḥ \|
yadyapi **indriya-gaṇa** eka eva, tathāpy ekaikendriya-vṛttīnām
anantatvād gaṇair iti bahutvam ity arthaḥ \| indriyāṇāṁ jaḍatvāt svato
bahirmukhatā na sambhavatīty ata āha---kutsito viṣayonmukhaḥ \|
**satyam** ity āṅgīkāre \| yad vā, rājante sva-śaktyā dyotante iti
rājāno guṇāḥ, tebhyaḥ iveti śikṣāyāṁ saṁsārāvṛtti-hetu-gaṇebhyo bibhyaj
janaḥ samudrikta-sukhāya samudrādi-jala-vāsena tapasyati, tathāham apīti
bhāvaḥ \|

yad vā, ---pañca-bhūta-mudrā-sahite śarīre **śete bhayād iva**
aṅguṣṭha-mātraḥ san aṅguṣṭha-mātraḥ pūruṣaḥ \[tai.ā. 10.38.1, ma.nā.u.
16.3\] iti śrutiḥ \| tarhi jīvavaj janmādy api syād ata
āha---**upalambhana-mātraḥ** kevala-cinmayaḥ deha-dharmāspṛṣṭaḥ \|
katham ? \[bhā.pu. 10.60.12\]

\[toṣaṇī:\] bhagavad-vivakṣitasyottarānupapatteḥ---**satyam** iti \|
asya ṭīkāyās tātparyam idam rājabhyaḥ \[bhā.pu. 10.60.12\] ity-ādi yad
uktaṁ tat tu gauṇyaiva vṛttyā sambhavati, na tu mukhyayety
āha---**satyam** iti \| yad bhavān **antaḥ samudre** samudra-madhye
dvārakāyāṁ durge **śete** līnatayā prakāśate, tad **bhayād iva** ity
eva, na tu bhayād evety arthaḥ \| yato guṇākhya- rājabhyaś
cittākhyāntaḥ-karaṇa-samudre tasmād ivāntaryāmi-rūpeṇāpi **śete**, na tu
tasmād evety arthaḥ \| ubhayatra hetuḥ---**upalambhana**- iti \| yac ca
balavadbhiḥ ity-ādikam uktaṁ tat tu mukhyayaiva \| **satyam** ity
āha---**kadindriya-gaṇa**-yuktair jivaiḥ kartṛbhir **nityam** eva **kṛto
vigraho** virodho yatra, tathābhūtas **tvam** ataḥ sampraty api tādṛśe
rājabhiḥ sa eva kartuṁ yogya ity arthaḥ \| śleṣeṇa
yato\'ntaryāmi-rūpatve'pi kutsitair indriya-gaṇaiḥ kṛta-vigrahas tvam
ity arthaḥ\| yatas tādṛśeṣu ca tvadīya-svarūpādīnāṁ yathāvat sphūrtir
nāsti, tatas teṣāṁ tvayi virodhārucy-ādimaya-dveṣī yukta eveti bhāvaḥ \|

athavā---**ātmā** tvam, **śete** ity anvayānupapatter ātmatvam ity
etayoḥ padayor na viśeṣaṇa-viśeṣya-bhāvaḥ, ata upamānopameya-bhāva eva
yojyaḥ \| ivādy-abhāvaḥ, na tu luptopameyam \| ayam arthaḥ---he
**urukrama** ! **ātmā** śuddha-jīvo yathā **guṇebhyas** tan-mayebhyaḥ
**kadindriyebhyo bhayād** iva **antar** hṛdayākāśe samudravad-anavagāhye
**śete** līnatayā vasati, tathā tvaṁ **guṇebhyaḥ** sadā, adhunā tu
tat-pradhānebhyo rājabhyaś ca **bhayād ivāntaḥ samudre** samudrasya
madhye śvetadvīpādāv iva dvārakākhye dhāmni **śete** nityaṁ tathā vasasi
\| tathā ca śrutayaḥ---

> yam antaḥ-samudre kavayo vayanti
>
> tad akṣare parame prajātayaḥ \|
>
> yataḥ prasūtā jagataḥ prasūtī
>
> toyena jīvān vyāsasarja bhūmyām \|\| \[ma.nā.u. 1.3-4\]

ity ārabhya, tad eva brahma paramaṁ kavīnām \[ma.nā.u.1.6\] ity-ādyāḥ,

yaṁ kāmaye taṁ tam ugraṁ kṛṇomi, taṁ brahmāṇaṁ tam ṛṣiṁ taṁ sumedhām
\[devī-sūkta 5\] samayo niścarantaḥ iti mahā-lakṣmī-vacanādyāś ca,
nityaṁ sannihitas tatra bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ \[bhā.pu. 11.31.24\] ity
ekādaśa-vacanaṁ ca \| tatrobhayatra sāmyam upaiti bhagavaty api
tan-mātratvaṁ sac-cid-ānanda-vigrahatvād iti \|\|35\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** evaṁ bhagavatā yad
uktam, tad evānyathayati **satyaṁ bhayād iva** ity-ādi bahubhiḥ \|
\|\|35\|\|

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **satyam antaḥ śete** \|
kūtaḥ ? **guṇebhyo bhayāt** \| kutaḥ ? bahiḥ sthityā
viṣaya-doṣa-sparśa-śaṅkāta ity arthaḥ \| **iva** iti tattvato
doṣāsparśena bhayābhāvāt \| **kramo** vikramaḥ \| **guṇebhya** iti teṣāṁ
prāyaḥ sarvatra prakāśamānatayā rājabhir aikyena tenaiva rājñāṁ bodhanāt
\| evaṁ balavattvena **kadindriyair** ity api bahiḥ-sthasya
antaḥ-śayanam upapādayati---**upa**- iti \| jñāna-ghana-mūrtiḥ, ata eva
**ātmā** bhavān eva \| bhavān iti vaktavye ātmā iti pūrvavad gauravāt \|

yad vā, pūrvato bhavān ity anuvartata eva, ātmā svayam eveti \| kiṁ vā,
antaryāmitayety arthaḥ \| **satyam** iti paratrāpy anuvartate \|
**kadindriya-gaṇaiḥ** saha **kṛto vigraho** virodho yena saḥ, tebhyo
narakādiṣu duḥkha-pradānāt \| yad vā, taiḥ **kṛto vigraho** yasmin saḥ,
teṣāṁ tvad-abhajanāt\| evaṁ pūrvokta-balavadbhir ity atrāpi vākyaṁ
jñeyam \| tava sevakaiḥ paricaryā-mātra-bhaktau pravartamānair api,
atraivam eka-vākyatā, yato\'**ntaḥ śete**, ataḥ **kadindriyaiḥ
kṛtavigrahaḥ**, bahirmukhatayā antar-dṛṣṭy-abhāvena
mahā-duṣṭatā-sampatteḥ \| ata eva **tvat-sevakair** **vidhūtam** \|
nṛpa-pade kadindriyatva-siddher iti \|\|35\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :**
bhagavad-vivakṣitasyottarānupapatteḥ---**satyam** iti \| asya ṭīkāyās
tātparyam idam rājabhyaḥ \[bhā.pu. 10.60.12\] ity-ādi yad uktaṁ, tat tu
gauṇyaiva vṛttyā sambhavati, na tu mukhyayety āha---**satyam** iti \|
yad bhavān **antaḥ samudre** samudra-madhye dvārakāyāṁ durge **śete**
līnatayā prakāśate, tad **bhayād iva** ity eva, na tu bhayād evety
arthaḥ \| yato guṇākhya-rājabhyaś cittākhyāntaḥ-karaṇa-samudre tasmād
ivāntaryāmi-rūpeṇāpi **śete**, na tu tasmād evety arthaḥ \| ubhayatra
hetuḥ---**upalambhana**- iti \| yac ca balavadbhiḥ ity-ādikam uktaṁ, tat
tu mukhyayaiva \| **satyam** ity āha---**kadindriya-gaṇa**-yuktair
jivaiḥ kartṛbhir **nityam** eva **kṛto vigraho** virodho yatra,
tathābhūtas **tvam** ataḥ sampraty api tādṛśe rājabhiḥ sa eva kartuṁ
yogya ity arthaḥ \| śleṣeṇa yato\'ntaryāmi-rūpatve'pi kutsitair
indriya-gaṇaiḥ kṛta-vigrahas tvam ity arthaḥ\| yatas jīveṣv indriyeṣu
ca tvadīya-svarūpādīnāṁ yathāvat sphūrtir nāsti, tatas teṣāṁ tvayi
virodhārucy-ādimaya-dveṣī yukta eveti bhāvaḥ \| anyat taiḥ \|

athavā---**ātmā** tvam, **śete** ity anvayānupapatter ātmatvam \[ātmā
tvam\] ity etayoḥ padayor na viśeṣaṇa-viśeṣya-bhāvaḥ, ata
upamānopameya-bhāva eva yojyaḥ \| ivādy-abhāvaḥ, na tu luptopameyam \|
ayam arthaḥ---he **urukrama** ! **ātmā** śuddha-jīvo yathā **guṇebhyas**
tan-mayebhyaḥ **kadindriyebhyo bhayād** iva **antar** hṛdayākāśe
samudravad-anavagāhye **śete** līnatayā vasati, tathā tvaṁ **guṇebhyaḥ**
sadā, adhunā tu tat-pradhānebhyo rājabhyaś ca **bhayād ivāntaḥ samudre**
samudrasya madhye śvetadvīpādāv iva dvārakākhye dhāmni **śete** nityaṁ
tathā vasasi \| tathā ca śrutayaḥ---

> yam antaḥ-samudre kavayo vayanti
>
> tad akṣare parame prajātayaḥ \|
>
> yataḥ prasūtā jagataḥ prasūtī
>
> toyena jīvān vyāsasarja bhūmyām \|\| \[ma.nā.u. 1.3-4\]

ity ārabhya, tad eva brahma paramaṁ kavīnām \[ma.nā.u.1.6\] ity-ādyāḥ,

yaṁ kāmaye taṁ tam ugraṁ kṛṇomi, taṁ brahmāṇaṁ tam ṛṣiṁ taṁ sumedhām
\[ṛ.ve. 10.125.5, devī-sūkta 5\] samayo niścarantaḥ iti
mahā-lakṣmī-vacanādyāś ca, nityaṁ sannihitas tatra bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
\[bhā.pu. 11.31.24\] ity ekādaśa-vacanaṁ ca \| tatrobhayatra sāmyam
upaiti bhagavaty api tan-mātratvaṁ sac-cid-ānanda-vigrahatvād iti
\|\|35\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : satyam** iti \| \[kad-indriya-gaṇaiḥ
iti bhā. 8.3.28-padye draṣṭavyam\]\|\|35\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** rājabhyo bibhyat subhru
samudraṁ śaraṇaṁ gatān \[bhā.pu. 10.60.12\] iti yad uktam, tad api
satyam evety āha---**satyam** ity-ādi \| he **urukrama** ! **ātmā**
bhavān vigraha-rūpī, tvaṁ guṇebhyo guṇa-kāryebhyo rājabhyo **bhayād
iva** samudre'ntaḥ **antaḥ-samudraṁ śete** iti yat tad api **satyam** \|
kīdṛśa ātmā ? **upalambhana-mātraḥ** \| upalambhanam upalabdhir jñānaṁ
tanmātram aṁśo yasya \| jñānam iti yad vastu, tad api tavaiva mātrety
arthaḥ \| vastutas tu, asamudro mudrā saṅkocaḥ, tayā saha vartata iti
tathā \| na samudram asamudram asaṅkocam iti yāvat \| evaṁ-vidhe'ntaḥ
bhaktānām antaḥkaraṇe śete iva \| kīdṛśaḥ ? **bhayāt**, bhayam atti iti
bhayāt \| yad bibheti svayaṁ bhayaṁ \[bhā.pu. 1.1.14\], bhīr api yad
bibheti \[bhā.pu. 1.8.34\] ity-ādy-ukteḥ \| punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ? **guṇebhyo**
guṇāḍhyaḥ \| ibhya āḍhyo dhanī ity-ādy-amaraḥ \| guṇātīto'pi
bhakta-vātsalyādi-maṅgala-guṇa-bhūyiṣṭhaḥ \| atas tava kuto bhīḥ ? ato
rājabhyo bibhyata iti yad uktam, tad abibhyata iti mantavyam \| samudraṁ
mudānandasya rā dānaṁ, tayā saha vartamānam, śaraṇaṁ gṛhaṁ dhāma, gatā
iti \|

bhagavad-vacanam anyathā vyākhyāti \| kiṁ tu abhaktās tu tvām evam
ajānanto bhavatā saha vigrahaṁ kurvantīty āha---**nityam** ity-ādi \|
**kadindriya-gaṇās** tad-vimukhendriyāḥ \| ata eva te'balā eva
jñāna-rahitatvāt, taiḥ **kṛta-vigrahaḥ** kṛta-deha eva tvaṁ na tu tair
gīyase, kadindriya-gaṇatvena adhamatvād durbalā eva te, yatas tena
balavadbhiḥ \[12\] kṛta-dveṣān iti yad uktam, tad api
virodhi-lakṣaṇayaiveti satyaṁ tyakta-nṛpāsanān iti yad uktam, tad api
satyam eva \| kutaḥ ? ity āha---**tvat-sevakair** ity-ādi \| tvat-sevakā
api nṛpa-padaṁ tyajanti, kiṁ punas tvam iti sarvathā satya-vāg eva
bhavān iti vakroktiḥ \|\|35\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** yad uktaṁ---rājabhyo
bibhyat subhru samudraṁ śaraṇaṁ gatān \[bhā.pu. 10.60.12\] iti
tatrāha---**satyam** iti \| he **urukrama** ! mahāśakte iti bhayābhāvaṁ
darśayati---kramaḥ śaktau parīpāṭyām iti viśvaḥ \| guṇa-śabdādayas
tebhyaḥ rājanta iti rājānaḥ, tebhyo bhaktānāṁ yad bhayaṁ, tad eva
bhaktādhīnasya tavāpi bhayam iva ity atas tad-bhayād iva antaḥ-samudre
samudravad agādhe sva-bhakta-hṛdaya eva śete \| ataḥ śaraṇaṁ gatān iti
\| śaraṇa-śabdasya gṛham ity arthaḥ kṛtaḥ \|\
\
tatra mamāstitve kiṁ pramāṇam ? iti cet, tatrāha---nāpaiṣi nātha
hṛdayāmbu-ruhāṁ sva-puṁsām \[bhā.pu. 3.9.5\] iti, praṇaya-raśanayā
dhṛtāṅghri-padmaḥ \[bhā.pu. 11.2.55\] iti brahmādi-vākyād **upalambhanaṁ
mātrāṇāṁ** rūpa-rasa-gandhādīnāṁ yasya saḥ \| bhaktair
dhyānopalabhyamāna-saundaryādir ity arthaḥ \| **ātmā** paramātmā bhavān
evety arthaḥ \|

yad uktaṁ---balavadbhiḥ kṛtad-veṣān \[12\] iti tatrāha---**nityam** iti
\| **kadindriya-gaṇaiḥ** svabhaktasya viṣaya-grāhibhir indriyaiḥ saha
kṛta-yuddhaḥ gaṇair iti vṛtty-abhiprāyeṇa bahutvaṁ bhaktasya
saṁsāra-duḥkha-trāṇārtham iti bhāvaḥ \|

ayam arthaḥ---sādhaka-bhaktānāṁ prathamato dhyāna-gamyaṁ yat kiñcin
mādhuryam eva tvaṁ bhavasi, na tu pratyakṣī-bhavasi yat, tan manye
viṣayebhyo bhayād iva tad-antaḥkaraṇe praviśya svapiṣy eva \| yato
bhakti-vṛddhyā kadindriyeṣu vijiteṣu satsu viṣaya-nivṛttau satyāṁ svāpād
utthita iva sākṣād eva pratyakṣībhūya svīyāneka-mādhuryāṇi svabhaktān
grāhayasīti \|

yad uktaṁ---tyakta-nṛpāsanām \[12\] iti tad api yuktam evety
āha---**tvat-sevakair** api nṛpa-padaṁ nṛpāsanam aviveka-bahulatvād
**andhaṁ tama** iva **vidhūtaṁ** tyaktaṁ, kiṁ punar vaktavyaṁ ? tvayā
tyaktam iti \| atra sevakair iti pada-dṛṣṭyā pūrvatrobhayatrāpi
bhakta-sambandho vyākhyātaḥ \|\|35\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.36 \|\|**

**tvat-pāda-padma-makaranda-juṣāṁ munīnāṁ**

**vartmāsphuṭaṁ nṛ-paśubhir nanu durvibhāvyam \|**

**yasmād alaukikam ivehitam īśvarasya**

**bhūmaṁs tavehitam atho anu ye bhavantam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** aspaṣṭa-vartmanāṁ puṁsām
aloka-patham īyuṣām \[10.60.13\] iti yad uktaṁ, tad api tathaivety
āha---**tvat-pāda**- iti \| **nṛ-paśubhir** narākāraiḥ paśubhiḥ \| kiṁ
punar vaktavyaṁ ? tava **vartmāsphuṭam** iti \| kiṁ ca, **yasmād ye
bhavantam anu**vartante teṣām api **īhitam** **alaukikam iva** \|
**atho** ataḥ kim u vaktavyaṁ **tava īśvarasya** **īhitam alaukikam**
ity arthaḥ \| āsthitāḥ padavīṁ subhrūḥ prāyaḥ sīdanti yoṣitaḥ
\[10.60.13\] ity asya parihāraṁ vakṣyati---yad vāñchayā \[10.60.38\] iti
pañcama-śloke \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** tathaiva satyam eva
alaukikehatvam āha---*kiṁ ca* iti \| *ity artha*
iti---vidhi-niṣedha-viṣayatā-jñasyaiva na jñāninaḥ, natarāṁ sarvajñasya
tava iti bhāvaḥ \| *pañcama-śloke*---ataḥ paratra pañcama ity arthaḥ \|
**nanu** prema-sambodhane niścaye vā\| **munayo** jñāninaḥ, teṣām api
tvad-bhakta-saṅgādi-prabhāveṇa **tvat-pādayor** **makarando** yat kiñcin
mādhuryaṁ, taj-**juṣāṁ** **vartma** nijābhirucita-ceṣṭitam \| asphuṭaṁ
svācchādana-loka-saṅgrahādy-artha-ceṣṭitāntarāvṛtam ato
**durvibhāvyam**, boddhum aśakyam iti bhāvaḥ \| ihāspaṣṭa-vartmanām iti
sva-mate yojitam \| **alaukikam iva** yataḥ lokātītaṁ laukikatve\'py
alaukikatva-darśanāt \| tatra hetuḥ---he **bhūman** !
aparicchinna-māhātmya ! iti \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **munayo** jñāninaḥ,
teṣām api tvad-bhakta-saṅgādi-prabhāveṇa **tvat-pādayor makarando**
bhakti-rasas taj-**juṣāṁ** satām, kintarāṁ sahaja-bhaktimatām, kintamāṁ
bhavety arthaḥ \| **nanu** prema-sambodhane niścaye vā \| **asphuṭam**
asaṅgatam, madhu-pānena mattānām ivānanusandhānena nijācāra-cyute, ato
**durvibhāvyaṁ** boddhum aśakyam \| **nṛ-paśubhir** iti sad-buddhibhis
tu boddhuṁ śakyam iti bhāvaḥ \| teṣāṁ karmasv anadhikārāt, tac ca tāvat
karmāṇi kurvīta \[bhā.pu. 11.20.9\] ity-ādau bahuśo vaktavyam evam eva
\| kiṁ ca, teṣām abhiprāyādi-tarkanāc ca \| karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṁ
boddhavyaṁ ca vikarmaṇaḥ \[gī. 4.17\] ity-ādau vikarmaṇo\'pi kasyacid
anumata-vihitatvād iti dik \|

aloka-patham īyuṣām \[bhā.pu. 10.60.13\] ity atrottaraṁ---**yasmād** iti
\| **alaukikaṁ** lokātītam, **iva** iti prāyaḥ sadācāra-pālanena
lokānusaraṇāt \| yad vā, lokokti-rītyānadhikārthaḥ \| tatra
hetuḥ---**bhūman** ! he aparicchinna-māhātmya ! iti laukikatve
paricchinnatāpattyā lokātītasya eva īhitasya yogyatvād iti bhāvaḥ anyat
tair vyākhyātam \| yad vā, asphuṭatve hetuḥ---**yasmād** iti \| **iva**
eva, **alaukikam** eva, **atho** atas teṣām api **īhitam alaukikam** eva
\| anyat samānam \|

evam apy aloka-patham īyuṣām \[bhā.pu. 10.60.13\] ity asyottaraṁ siddham
eva \| yad vā, pūrvam apy **aspaṣṭa-vartmanām** ity atraiva
hetuḥ---**aloka-** iti \| nanu, niścaye, etad api niścitam evety arthaḥ
\|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : nanu** prema-sambodhane niścaye
vā **munayo** jñāninaḥ, teṣām api tvad-bhakta-saṅgādi-prabhāvena
**tvat-pādayor makarando** yat kiñcin **mādhuryaṁ** taj-**juṣāṁ**
**vartma** nijābhirucita-ceṣṭitam **asphuṭaṁ**
svācchādana-loka-saṅgrahādy-artha-ceṣṭitāntareṇa āvṛtam ato
**durvibhāvyaṁ** boddhum aśakyam iti bhāvaḥ \| **nṛ-paśubhir** iti
sad-buddhibhis tu boddhuṁ śakyam iti bhāvaḥ ity **aspaṣṭa-varmanām** iti
sva-mate yojitam \| **aloka**- iti yojayati---**yasmād** iti \|
**alaukikaṁ** lokātītam iveti laukikatve\'py alaukikatva-darśanāt \|
tatra hetuḥ---**bhūman** ! he aparicchinna-māhātmya ! iti \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** nanu, aspaṣṭa-vartmanām
\[bhā.pu. 10.60.13\] iti yad uktam, tad api satyam eva \| tava
vartmano'spaṣṭatvaṁ prasiddham iti kiṁ citraṁ ? tvad-anusṛtānām api yat,
tathaivety āha---**tvat-pāda-padma-** ity-ādi \| **tvat-pāda-padme** yo
**makarandaś** cid-rasaḥ, taj-**juṣāṁ** **munīnāṁ** **vartma asphuṭam**,
tan **nṛ-paśubhir** narākāraiḥ paśubhir **durvibhāvyam** \|

**nanu** bhoḥ kutaḥ ? ity āha---**yasmād īśvarasya tavehitam alaukikam**
eva \| **iva** evārthe \| he **bhūman** ! **bhavantam anu** anugatā ye
ekānta-bhaktāḥ, teṣāṁ ca **īhitam alaukikam** eva \| tattvād
**vartmāsphuṭam** eveti satya-vāg evāsīti vākyārthaḥ \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** aspaṣṭa-vartmanāṁ
\[bhā.pu. 10.60.13\] iti yad uktam, tad api tathety āha---**tvad** ti \|
**nanv** iti niścaye \| aloka-patham īyuṣām \[bhā.pu. 10.60.13\] iti yad
uktaṁ, tad api satyam evety āha---**yasmād alaukikaṁ** lokātītam eva
**tavehitam atho** ata eva **bhavantam anu**vartante ye, teṣām apīhitam
alaukikam eva \|\|36\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.37 \|\|**

**niṣkiñcano nanu bhavān na yato'sti kiñcid**

**yasmai baliṁ balibhujo'pi haranty ajādyāḥ \|**

**na tvā vidanty asutṛpo'ntakam āḍhyatāndhāḥ**

**preṣṭho bhavān bali-bhujām api te'pi tubhyam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

niṣkiñcanā vayaṁ śaśvan niṣkiñcana-jana-priyāḥ \|

> tasmāt prāyeṇa na hy āḍhyā māṁ bhajanti sumadhyame \|\| \[bhā.pu.
> 10.60.14\]

ity etac chlokoktaṁ doṣa-trayaṁ pariharati---**niṣkiñcana** iti \|
daridratā-lakṣaṇaṁ niṣkiñcanatvaṁ tu tava na ghaṭata ity āha---**yasmā**
iti \| anyato **balibhujaḥ** pūjyā api brahmādayo **yasmai** bhavate
**baliṁ haranti,** tasya sarveśvarasya bhavato daridratā na ghaṭata ity
arthaḥ \| **niṣkiñcana-jana-priyāḥ** ity atra tatpuruṣeṇa bahuvrīhiṇā vā
nindā syād iti svayam apy ubhayathā stauti---**preṣṭho bhavān** iti \|
**balibhujāṁ** brahmādīnāṁ lokeśvarāṇāṁ tvaṁ preṣṭhaḥ, **te'pi tubhyaṁ**
taveti \| tasmāt prāyeṇa na hy āḍhyā māṁ bhajanti \[bhā.pu. 10.60.14\]
iti tasyottaraṁ---**na tvā vidanti** iti \| **āḍhyatayā'ndhās** **tvā**
tvām **antakaṁ** **na vidanti** \| atas te **asutṛpaḥ** asūn eva
tarpayanti na tvāṁ bhajantīty arthaḥ \|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *anyato*\'nyebhyaḥ \| *ity
artha* iti---na hi mat-kaṭākṣāpekṣi-brahmādi-sevya-pāda-mat-sevyasya
naiḥsva-lakṣaṇa-dor-gatyaṁ saṅgacchata iti bhāvaḥ \| tat-puruṣeṇa
niṣkiñcana-janānāṁ priyā ity evaṁ-rūpeṇa \| bahuvrīhiṇā niṣkiñcana-janāḥ
priyā yeṣāṁ te tathety evaṁ-rūpeṇa vā \| svayam api rukmiṇy api \|
ubhayathā samāsa-dvayābhiprāyeṇa \| **preṣṭho**\'tipriyaḥ \| *ity artha*
iti---na hi prāṇa-tarpaṇa-parāṇāṁ tvad-dṛṣṭir bhavatīti bhāvaḥ \|

\[toṣaṇī:\] niṣkiñcanāḥ \[bhā.pu. 10.60.14\] ity asya yogyam arthaṁ
yojayati \| **nir** iti niṣedhe \| **nanu** niścaye \| **yato** yad
vyatiriktam anyat kiñcin nāsti, ata eva **niṣkiñcanaḥ**, nānyata ity
artha \| nanu, daridra eva niṣkiñcanaḥ prasiddhaḥ---satyam, tādṛśatvaṁ
tu tava na ghaṭata ity āha---**yasmā** iti \|

tasmāt prāyeṇa \[bhā.pu. 10.60.14\] ity uktaṁ satyam evety āha---**na
tvām** iti \| antam iti vīryāṇi tasyākhila-deha-bhājām \[bhā.pu.
10.1.7\], *vīryāṇi tasyākhila* iti, pramattam uccair iti kṛtya-cintayā
\[bhā.pu. 10.51.49\] ity-ādi-prāmāṇyena, **na yato\'sti kiñcit** iti
nyāyena ca teṣām antavad rūpaṁ **tvāṁ** tad-rūpatayā **na vidanti**,
sva-śāsana-kartṛtvenāpi nānusandadhate \|

yad vā, **ante** maraṇe\'pi **kaṁ** smaraṇādinā sukhaṁ yasmāt, tam api
**na vidanti** \| te ke ? ye **āḍhyatayāndhā** jñāna-hīnāḥ, na tu
bahir-āḍhya-mātrāś ca \| ata eva bhavatāpi *prāyeṇa* ity uktam\|
**yato** yatra vā **asu-tṛpo** nijendriya-mātra-bharaṇa-tatparāḥ, na tv
anya iti \| *niṣkiñcana-jana* ity asya yogyam arthaṁ
yojayati---**bali-bhujām** iti \| teṣām api **bhavān** eva **preṣṭhaḥ,**
na tu balayo bali-dātāro vā \| tad astu me nātha sa bhūri-bhāgaḥ
\[bhā.pu. 10.14.30\] ity-ādibhyaḥ \| ata eva **āḍhyā** api tena tattayā
**andhāḥ,** pratyuta niṣkiñcanā eva, viṣaya-bhoge\'pi tatra rāgābhāvāt
\|

nanu, sampad-abhāva-mātreṇa anye tad-aṅga-brahmacaryatayāpi sambhavāt,
ata eva tvāṁ ta eva bhajanti, nānye \| evaṁ tavāpi ta eva preṣṭhā iti
tan-niṣkiñcanatvaṁ param aviśiṣṭam eveti \| atra samāsa-bhedakasya
svara-viśeṣasyānusandhānaṁ vaikalyād eva jñeyam \| eka-vākyatā caivaṁ
niścitaṁ---**bhavān niṣkiñcano** yadi, tarhi kathaṁ mad-uktam
aṅgīcakarthaiva ? satyam, tatra na daridratva-lakṣaṇenārthena, kintv
anenaivety āha---**na** iti \| ata eva **yasmā** ity-ādi \| ye tu
**tvāṁ** **na vindanti** te khalv **āḍhyatāndhā asutṛpaś** ca \| ye tu
**tvāṁ vindanti** te khalv atipreṣṭhā ity etad-yojanāpekṣayaiva
tad-uktākrameṇottaram \| āsthitāḥ \[bhā.pu. 10.60.13\] ity-ādes tūttaraṁ
saṁrambha-yogyatvāt tat-prasaṅge deyam \|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **yato** yad-vyatiriktam
\| nanu, daridra eva niṣkiñcanaḥ prasiddhaḥ ? tatrāha---**yasmā** iti \|
**antakam** iti putrādi-mṛtyu-dṛṣṭāntenāvaśyaṁ bhāvi-maraṇānusandhānād
antakatayāpi vedituṁ yogyam iti bhāvaḥ \| yad vā, **ante** maraṇe\'pi
**kaṁ** smaraṇādinā sukhaṁ yasmāt tam api **na vidanti**,
yato\'**sutr̥paḥ**, yata **āḍhyatayā andhā** jñānahīnāḥ, ukta-nyāyena
sarvaloka śreṣṭhatvānnirahaṅkāratvādvā śrī-brahmādaya evākiñcanās teṣāṁ
preyān ity āha---**preṣṭha** iti \| **api**-dvayam ubhayatrāpi
prādhānyaṁ gamayati \| yad vā, **balibhujām** api kiṁ punar vaktavyam,
tvad-arthaṁ tyaktāśeṣa-parigrahāṇāṁ niṣkiñcanānām iti \| evaṁ
śrī-brahmādīnām āḍhyatve\'py āndhyābhāvena asutṛptvābhāvāj jñānena
tvad-bhajana-yogyam evety abhiprāyeṇa prastāva-prasaṅgatyā tathā
sarva-sāratarasya preṣṭhatvasya stuti-rītyānte nirdeśyatayā
pūrvokta-kramātikrameṇottaraṁ āsthitāḥ \[13\] ity-ādes tv agre
saṁrambheṇaiva deyatvena tad-uktānukūlottaraṁ prasaṅge\'smin na dattam
iti jñeya \| tac ca tair apy agre vyākhyeyam \| atraivam eka-vākyatā \|
**bali-bhujāṁ** pūjyam apy aho **āḍhyatāndhāḥ, vidanti**, tac ca yuktam
evety āha---**preṣṭha** iti, āḍhyatāndhānāṁ tad-apriyatvād iti bhāvaḥ
\|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

10.60.14\] ity asya yogyam arthaṁ yojayati \| **nir** iti niṣedhe \|

**niṣkiñcanaḥ**, nānyata ity artha \| nanu, daridra eva niṣkiñcanaḥ
prasiddhaḥ---satyam, tādṛśatvaṁ tu tava na ghaṭata ity āha---**yasmā**
iti \|

tvām** iti \| **antakam** iti vīryāṇi tasyākhila-deha-bhājām \[bhā.pu.
10.1.7\], *vīryāṇi tasyākhila* iti, pramattam uccair iti kṛtya-cintayā
\[bhā.pu. 10.51.49\] ity-ādi-prāmāṇyena, **na yato\'sti kiñcit** iti
nyāyena ca teṣām antaka-rūpaṁ **tvāṁ** tad-rūpatayā **na vidanti**,
sva-śāsana-kartṛtvenāpi nānusandadhate \|

**na vidanti** \| te ke ? ye **āḍhyatayāndhā** jñāna-hīnāḥ, na tu
bahir-āḍhya-mātrāś ca \| ata eva bhavatāpi *prāyeṇa* ity uktam\|
**yato** yatra vā **asu-tṛpo** nijendriya-mātra-bharaṇa-tatparāḥ, na tv
anya iti \| *niṣkiñcana-jana* ity asya yogyam arthaṁ
yojayati---**bali-bhujām** iti \| teṣām api **bhavān** eva **preṣṭhaḥ,**
na tu balayo bali-dātāro vā \| tad astu me nātha sa bhūri-bhāgaḥ

**andhāḥ,** pratyuta niṣkiñcanā eva, viṣaya-bhoge\'pi tatra rāgābhāvāt

nanu, sampad-abhāva-mātreṇa anye turaṅga-brahmacaryatayāpi sambhavāt,
ata eva **tvāṁ** ta eva bhajanti, nānye \| evaṁ tavāpi ta eva preṣṭhā
iti tan-niṣkiñcanatvaṁ parama-viśiṣṭam eveti \| atra samāsa-bhedakasya
svara-viśeṣasyānusandhānaṁ vaikalpād eva jñeyam \| eka-vākyatā caivaṁ
niścitaṁ---**bhavān niṣkiñcano** yadi, tarhi kathaṁ mad-uktam
aṅgīcakarthaiva ? satyam, tatra na daridratva-lakṣaṇenārthena, kintv
anenaivety āha---**na** iti \| ata eva **yasmā** ity-ādi \| ye tu
**tvāṁ** **na vindanti** te khalv **āḍhyatāndhā asutṛpaś** ca \| ye tu
**tvāṁ vindanti** ity āha---**preṣṭha** te khalv atipreṣṭhā ity
etad-yojanāpekṣayaiva tad-uktātikrameṇottaram \| āsthitāḥ \[bhā.pu.
10.60.13\] ity-ādes tūttaraṁ saṁrambha-yogyatvāt tat-prasaṅge deyam
\|\|37\|\|

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** niṣkiñcana iti \| nir iti niṣedhe
\| nu niścitaṁ bhavān niṣkiñcanaḥ tarhi kathaṁ maduktamaṅgīcakarthaiva
satyam \| tat tu na daridratvaḷenena, kintvanenaivety āha---**na** iti
\| ata eva **yasmā** ity-ādi \| ye tu **tvāṁ na vidanti**, te khalv
**āḍhyatāndhā** **asutṛpaś** ca \| ye tu tvāṁ vidanti, te khalv
atiśreṣṭhā ity āha---**preṣṭha** iti \| etad-yojanāpekṣayaiva
tad-uktātikrameṇottaram \| **āsthitā** ity-ādes tūttaraṁ
saṁrambha-yogyatvāt tat-prasaṅge deyam \|\|37-41\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** nanu, niṣkiñcanā vayaṁ
śaśvan niṣkiñcana-janapriyāḥ \[bhā.pu. 10.60.14\] iti yad uktam, tad api
satyam evety āha---**niṣkiñcana** ity-ādi \| **nanu** bho bhagavan !
**bhavān** **niṣkiñcana** eva \| kutaḥ ? ity āha---**na yato'sti
kiñcit**, na vidyate kiñcana yasmād iti pañcamy anya-padārthena, satyam
eva tad ity arthaḥ \|

nanu brahmādayo mad-bhinnāḥ pṛthag-īśā vartante, tat katham ayam arthaḥ
samarthyatām ity āśaṅkyāha---**yasmai** **balim** ity-ādi \|
**bali-bhujo** brahmādayo **yasmai tubhyaṁ** baliṁ haranti,
ato'**sutṛpo** viṣayiṇaḥ **tvāṁ na vidanti** \| kīdṛśaṁ tvāṁ ?
**antakaṁ** kālākhya-śaktyā sarva-saṁhārakam \| te kīdṛśāḥ ?
ātmatayaiśvaryeṇāndhāḥ \| na kevalaṁ teṣām evāntakaḥ, api tu balibhujāṁ
brahmādīnām api, na kevalam asutṛpa eva āḍhyatāndhās te'pi
balibhujo'pīty arthaḥ \| atas tvaṁ **preṣṭhaḥ** priyatamaḥ, sarveṣāṁ
preṣṭhaḥ \| ata eva **niṣkiñcano**'sīti yat tat satyam eveti vākyārthaḥ
\|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** niṣkiñcanā vayaṁ śaśvat
\[bhā.pu. 10.60.14\] iti yad uktaṁ tatrāha---**niṣkiñcana** iti \|
**nir** iti niṣedhe \| nāsty adhikaṁ kim api vastu yasmāt, sa
niṣkiñcanatvam \| yad vā, sarva-vibhaktikas tasiḥ \| na vidyate kiñcana
aiśvarya-mādhurye yaśo-bala-jñāna-vairāgyādikaṁ, kiṁ tu sarvāṁśitvāt
sampūrṇam eva yasya saḥ \| daridratvān na vidyate kiñcanāpi yasya sa ity
arthas tu tvayi na ghaṭata ity āha---**yasmai** iti \| tasmāt prāyeṇa na
hy āḍhyā māṁ bhajantīti yad uktaṁ tatrāha---**na** iti \| **āḍhyatayā
andhāḥ**, ata eva **asutṛpaḥ** sva-prāṇa-tarpakā bahir-mukhās tvam
astakaṁ daṇḍa-kartāraṁ naiva vidanti, kuto bhajiṣyanti ? ity arthaḥ \|
**niṣkiñcana-jana-priyā** iti yad uktaṁ, tatra tat-puruṣa-samāsam
āśritya kaimutyenāha---**preṣṭha** iti \| bhavān **balibhujām** api
sakāmānām api brahmādīnāṁ **preṣṭhaḥ**, kim uta niṣkiñcanānāṁ
niṣkāma-bhaktānāṁ preṣṭha iti bahuvrīhim āśritya āha---te'pi
sakāma-bhaktā api tubhyaṁ tava priyāḥ, kim uta niṣkāma-bhaktāḥ,
**niṣkiñcana-janā**ḥ---

> na yeṣāṁ bhajanād anyac cikīrṣitam abhīpsitam \|
>
> jijñāsitaṁ ca kiñcit te jñeyā niṣkiñcanā budhaiḥ \|\|

iti paurāṇikokter bhakta-vācitve niṣkiñcana-śabdo vyākhyātaḥ \|\|37\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.38 \|\|**

**tvaṁ vai samasta-puruṣārtha-mayaḥ phalātmā**

**yad-vāñchayā sumatayo visṛjanti kṛtsnam \|**

**teṣāṁ vibho samucito bhavataḥ samājaḥ**

**puṁsaḥ striyāś ca ratayoḥ sukha-duḥkhinor na \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : bali-bhujām api bhavān preṣṭha**
\[37\] ity atra hetuṁ vadantī, yayor eva samaṁ vittaṁ \[bhā.pu.
10.60.15\] ity anenoktam anaucityaṁ pariharati---**tvaṁ vā** iti \|
**phalātmā** eram ānanda-rūpaḥ, etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrām
upajīvanti \[br̥.ā.u. 4.3.33\] iti śruteḥ \| **samājaḥ**
sevya-sevaka-lakṣaṇa-sambandho, na tu **puṁsaḥ striyāś** ca mitho
**ratayoḥ** \| ata eva tat-kṛta-**sukha-duḥkhinoḥ**, tad-ākulayor ity
arthaḥ \|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** samasta-puruṣārthā
dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣāḥ svarūpam asyeti tathā \| svarūpe mayaṭ \|
paramānanda-rūpatvam āha śrutiḥ---*etasya* paramātma-rūpasya *mātrām*
aṁśam *upajīvanty* āśrayantīty arthaḥ \| ata eva *mitho* ratatvād eva \|
*tat-kṛte* mitho-rati-kṛte *sukha-duḥkhe* yayor vidyate, tau tathā tayoḥ
\| *ity artha* iti---paraspara-rati-kṛta-sukha-duḥkha-kliṣṭayos tava
ratiḥ kadāpi na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ \|

\[**laghu-toṣaṇī**\] **vai** prasiddhau \| **samastāḥ puruṣārthā**
dharmādayaś catvāras tvad-bhakti-bhedāś ca tan-**mayas**
tat-prācuryavān---

etaṁ sampāddhāma ity ācakṣate, etaṁ sarvāṇi rāmāṇi abhisaṁyanti, eṣa u
eva bhāmanīḥ, sa eṣa hi sarvāṇi rāmāṇi nayatām, eṣa u eva bhāmanīḥ, eṣa
sarveṣu vadeṣu bhāti \[ajñātam\] ity-ādi, ayam ātmāpahata-pāpmā \[chā.u.
8.15.1\] ity-ādi-śruteḥ \| ata eva bṛhat sāmni, bṛhat pārthivaṁ bṛhad
antarikṣaṁ bṛhad divaṁ bṛhad vāmaṁ bṛhadbhyo vāmaṁ, vāmebhyo vāmam \[\]
iti brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmatvaṁ sarvebhyo\'pi manoramatvam upadiśyate, yataḥ
phalātmā ko hy evānyāt kaḥ prāṇyād yad eṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt \[tai.u.
2.7.1\] iti, raso vai saḥ rasaṁ hy evāyaṁ labdhvānandī bhavati \[tai.u.
2.7.1\] iti, etasmai vā ity-ādi śruteḥ \|

ato **yad** ity-ādi \| kṛtsnaṁ daihika-deha-vittādy-abhimānaṁ
loka-dvayāpekṣaṁ mokṣādikam api sarvaṁ visajanti, atas ta evākiñcanāḥ,
bhavān eva tat-preṣṭha iti yuktam eveti bhāvaḥ \| evaṁ
pūrvārtha-pratipādana-pūrvakam yayor ātma-samam \[bhā.pu. 10.60.15\]
ity-ādāv uttaram āha---**teṣām** iti \| **vibho** ! he sarveśvara ! evam
api taiḥ sahaiva **samyag ucitaḥ**, **bhavato** vittādy-apekṣā-rāhityena
tair eva sāmyāt, saṁ-śabdenānya-bhaktair apy aucityābhāsaḥ sūcitaḥ \|
**ratayor** iti bhāgyābhāva uktaḥ \| ata eva **sukha-duḥkhinor** iti,
duḥkha-pratīkāra-mātra-rūpaṁ sukhaṁ duḥkhaṁ ca tayor ucitam iti bhāvaḥ
\|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **vai** prasiddhau \|
**samastāḥ puruṣārthā** dharmādayaś catvāras tvad-bhakty-ādayaś ca
tan-**mayaḥ**, yataḥ **phalātmā** kasyacid ānanda-hetutvena, kasyacic ca
sākṣād-ānanda-svarūpatvenety evaṁ sarveṣām eva **teṣām** ānande
paryavasānāt \| yad vā, phala-rūpāṇāṁ teṣām ātmā ca pravartakaḥ \| evaṁ
sādhyatvaṁ sādhanatvaṁ coktam, ata eva **kṛtsnaṁ** sādhanādikam anyat
sarvaṁ **sumatayo** vivekino **visṛjanti** \|

yad vā, **puruṣārthaś** caturvargaḥ, tasya phalaṁ bhaktiḥ premā vā,
tasya **ātmā** ca, tasya tava **vāñchayā** vāñchā-mātreṇāpi, kiṁ punaḥ
prāptyā ? ity arthaḥ \| **kṛtsnaṁ** daihikaṁ dehaṁ vittābhimānaṁ
loka-dvayāpekṣāṁ mokṣādikam api sarvaṁ **visṛjanti** upekṣante,
atitucchatvāt, prāyo duḥkha-pradatvāc ca \| atas ta evākiñcanāḥ,
tat-preṣṭha eva bhavān iti yuktam eveti bhāvaḥ \|

yayor evety ādāv uttaram āha---**teṣām** iti \| **vibho** ! he
sarva-vyāpaka ! he jagadīśeti vā, tathāpi taiḥ sahaiva **samyag
ucitaḥ**, **bhavato**\'pi vittādy-apekṣā-rāhityena tair eva sāmyāt \|

yad vā, **vibho** ! he paripūrṇa ! ato vittādibhir **bhavataḥ**
sambandhāsiddher iti bhāvaḥ \| atyāginām api vividha-kāmena bhajatāṁ
tat-tat-phala-pradānādinā kathañcit sambandho yujyata iti
saṁ---śabdārthaḥ \| **ratayor** iti tyāgābhāva uktaḥ \| ata eva
**sukha-duḥkhinor** iti duḥkha-pratīkāra-mātra-rūpaṁ sukhaṁ duḥkhaṁ ca
tayor ucitam eveti bhāvaḥ \| anyat tair vyākhyātam \|

yad vā, vittādibhir grāmya-sukhe\'pi duḥkhinor eva, tathāpi ratayoḥ,
atas tābhyāṁ sarvathā nocita evetyartha \|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : vai** prasiddhau \| samastāḥ
**puruṣārthā** dharmādayaś catvāras tad-bhakti-bhedāś ca tan-**mayaḥ**
tat-prācuryavān, sarva-gandhaḥ sarva-rasaḥ \[chā.u. 3.14.4\] ity-ādi,
etaṁ sampāddhāma ity ācakṣate etaṁ sarvāṇi rāmāṇi abhisaṁyanti, eṣa u
eva bhāmanīḥ, sa eṣa hi sarvāṇi rāmāṇi nayatām, eṣa u eva bhāmanīḥ, eṣa
sarveṣu vadeṣu bhāti \[ajñātam\] ity-ādi, ayam ātmā apahata-pāpmā
\[chā.u. 8.15.1\] ity-ādi-śruteḥ \| ata eva bṛhat sāmni, bṛhat pārthivaṁ
bṛhad antarikṣaṁ bṛhad divaṁ bṛhad vāmaṁ bṛhadbhyo vāmaṁ, vāmebhyo vāmam
\[\] iti brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmatvaṁ sarvebhyo\'pi manoramatvam upadiśyate,
yataḥ **phalātmā** ko hy evānyāt kaḥ prāṇyād yad eṣa ākāśa ānando na
syāt \[tai.u. 2.7.1\] iti, raso vai saḥ \| rasaṁ hy evāyaṁ labdhvānandī
bhavati \[tai.u. 2.7.1\] iti, etasmai vā \[\] ity-ādi śruteḥ \| ato
**yad** ity-ādi **kṛtsnaṁ** daihika dehaṁ vittābhimānaṁ loka-dvayāpekṣā
mokṣādikam api sarvaṁ **visṛjanti,** atas ta evākiñcanāḥ bhavān eva
tat-preṣṭha iti yuktam eveti bhāvaḥ \|

evaṁ pūrvārtha-pratipādana-pūrvakaṁ yayor evety ādāv uttaram
āha---**teṣām** iti \| **vibho** ! he sarveśvara ! evam api taiḥ sahaiva
**samyag ucitaḥ** **bhavato** vittādy-apekṣā-rāhityena tair eva sāmyāt
saṁ-śabdenānya-bhaktair apy aucityābhāsaḥ sūcitaḥ \| **ratayor** iti
tyāgābhāva uktaḥ \|\
ata eva **sukha-duḥkhinor** iti duḥkha-pratīkāra-mātra-rūpaṁ sukhaṁ
duḥkhaṁ ca tayor ucitam iti bhāvaḥ \|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** yayor eva samaṁ vittaṁ yayor
eva samaṁ balaṁ \[bhā.pu. 10.60.15\] ity-ādi yad uktaṁ, tad api satyam
evety āha---**tvaṁ vai** **samasta**- ity-ādi \| tvaṁ
**samasta-puruṣārtha-mayaḥ phalātmā** phala-svarūpaḥ, sarva-puruṣārthaṁ
sarva-lokārthaṁ sarva-loka-nimittam ity arthaḥ \| ayaḥ-śubhāvaho vidhiḥ,
sarva-loka-śubhādṛṣṭam, yas tvāṁ bhajate, sa eva tava yogya ity arthaḥ
\| tenāhaṁ tvat-kāmatvena tvad-yogyaiva \| ato mama tvayā saha samatvam
asty eveti phalātmatāṁ darśayati---**yad vāñchayā** **sumatayo
visṛjanti** **kṛtsnam** \| phalārthaṁ hi sarva eva yatante \| he
**vibho** ! teṣāṁ samājo goṣṭhī **bhavataḥ** **samucita** eva \| tenāham
api bhavad-arthaṁ sarvam asṛjam, mayā saha goṣṭhī tava samucitaiveti
**puṁsaḥ striyāś** **ca** anyonyaṁ **ratayor** goṣṭhī **na samucitā** \|
tvayā saha yadi puṁso vā striyo vā goṣṭhī bhavati, tadā samucitaiva \|
sāndrānanda-svarūpeṇa bhavatā saha saṅgataḥ puruṣaḥ strī vā
tvat-samatvam eva labhate, na tv anyonyaṁ tayoḥ \| kutaḥ ? ity
āha---**sukha-duḥkhinoḥ**, kadācit sukhinoḥ kadācid duḥkhinoḥ \|
nitya-sukhe tvayi saṅgatas tu puruṣaḥ strī vā nitya-sukhitvam eva
labhate \| athavā, sukhe'pi kāma-sukhe'pi duḥkhinoḥ---duḥkhaṁ
kāma-sukhāpekṣā \[bha.pu.11.19.41\] ity ukteḥ \|\|38\|\|
