**mama māyayā mohitāḥ** \| kīdṛśaṁ māṁ ? **apavargeśam**, apagato vargo
varjanaṁ yasmāt, tathā-bhūtam īśaṁ **ye māṁ bhajanti**, tān kadāpi nāhaṁ
tyajāmīty arthaḥ \| yad vā, **dāmpatye** sati tapa-ādinā
ye'pavarge'pavarga-nimittaṁ māṁ bhajantīty arthaḥ \| kīdṛśaṁ māṁ ?
**śaṁ** sukha-svarūpam \| te kīdṛśāḥ ? **kāmātmanaḥ** \| mamedaṁ bhūyād
iti yaḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpaḥ, tatrātmā yatno yāsām \| tvaṁ tv akāmā pūrvokteḥ
\|\|52\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** sa-kāma-bhaktān
nindati---**ye** iti \| **dāmpatye** dāmpatyāya \"mat-patir mat-sukhado
bhavatu, mad-bhāryā vā mat-sukhadā bhavatu\" iti
prākṛta-dāmpaty-upabhoga-sukhārtham ity arthaḥ \| **apavargeśaṁ**
pañcama-skandha-gadyānusṛtyā prema-dātāram \| yad vā, **apa**kṛṣṭā
bhavanti **vargāś** catvāro'pi yataḥ, tathā-bhūtam **īśaṁ mām**
\|\|52\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.53 \|\|**

**māṁ prāpya māniny**[^9] **apavarga-sampadaṁ**

**vāñchanti ye sampada eva tat-patim \|**

**te manda-bhāgā niraye'pi ye nṛṇāṁ**

**mātrātmakatvān nirayaḥ susaṅgamaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** māyā-mohitatvam
evopapādayati---**māṁ prāpya** iti \| **apavargeṇa** saha **sampado**
yasmin, taṁ **mām** \| **prāpya** prasādya **ye** kevalaṁ **sampada**
eva viṣayān **vāñchanti**, na tu mām \| **tat-patiṁ** tāsāṁ sampadām api
yo'ham eva patiḥ, tam \| tathā **ye** viṣayā **niraye'py**
atinikṛṣṭa-yonāv api syuḥ, tān \| kiṁ ca, teṣāṁ puṁsāṁ
**mātrātmakatvād** viṣayātmakatvān **nirayaḥ** **susaṅgamaḥ**
śobhana-saṅgam eva syāt, ato **manda-bhāgyā** eva **te** ity arthaḥ
\|\|53\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atinikṛṣṭa-janau prokto
**nirayo** narake durbhaga-subhagayoś ca iti niruktiḥ \| viṣayiṇāṁ
naraka eva, na tu sukham ity āha---*kiṁ ca* iti \| *teṣāṁ*
mad-vimukhānāṁ mātrāsu śabdādi-viṣayeṣv ātmā buddhir yeṣāṁ, te
**mātrātmakāḥ \|** teṣāṁ bhāvas tattvaṁ, tasmāt \| ato
viṣayāviṣṭa-manastvād ity arthaḥ \| **susaṅgamaḥ** sulabhaḥ \| *ity
artha* iti---**manda-bhāgyā** eva viṣayaiṣiṇo narakeṣu gacchanti,
mad-vimukhatvād iti \| mat-parāṇāṁ tu mokṣaḥ kara-kalita eva, yānti
mad-yājino'pi mām \[gītā 9.25\] iti smṛteḥ \|

\[**toṣaṇī :**\] ṭīkāyām apavargeṇa saha sampado yasminn ity
artha-kathanam eva, na tu vigrahaḥ, upapada-vibhaktyā samāsābhāvāt\|
**apavarga**-yuktāḥ **sampado** yasminn iti vigrahaḥ \| samāsaś ca
madhyama-pada-lopī \| apavargo\'tra mokṣo bhakti-yogaś ca \| sampadyanta
iti sampado viṣayāḥ, ataḥ sampada eva viṣayān iti kākākṣi-nyāyena
sampada eva viṣayān eva \| na tu mām iti na saṅgacchate
samāna-vibhakty-antara-vyāvartakatvād eva-kārasya \| teṣāṁ
viṣaya-vāñchakānām \| **nirayo** nikṛṣṭa-yonir api suśobhano\'bhirucitaś
cāsau saṅgamanīyaś cety arthaḥ \| tatra hetur nirayasyāpi
viṣayātmakatvād iti \|

yad vā, he **bhāmini** ! parihāse'pi mad-viccheda-śaṅkayātma-koṭito'pi
parama-premāspade mayy api ratiḥ **apavarga**-rūpā prema-bhakti-lakṣaṇā
sampad yasmāt tam api tathā \| **tat-patiṁ**
pūrvokta-dāmpatyādi-**sampadaḥ** **patim** api **māṁ prāpya** vaśīkṛtya
sampade dāmpatyādi-sampad-artham eva māṁ **vāñchanti** punaḥ punaḥ
sevitum īhante, na tu mad-arthaṁ te manda-bhāgyā
apraśasta-bhakti-saṁskāravantaḥ \| yato **ye** tat-sampad-vāñchakās te
**niraye** narake\'**pi** santi tat-sādṛśyaṁ kathaṁ mad-bhakti-yogināṁ
yujyata iti bhāvaḥ \| nanu, sampad-icchakā mahā-vipatti-rūpaṁ nirayaṁ
kathaṁ gacchanti ? tatrāha---**nṛṇāṁ mātrātmakatvāt** pāpenāpi
tad-upārjakatvān **nirayaḥ susaṅgamaḥ**, prayatnaṁ vināpi labhya ity
arthaḥ \| anyat samam \|\|53\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** imam evārthaṁ
spaṣṭayati---**māṁ prāpya** iti \| he **mānini** ! **tat** tasmāt
**māṁ** **patiṁ** patitvena **prāpya** **apavarga-sampadaṁ ye
vāñchanti**, te **sampada** eva daridrā eva \| daridrā hi kṣudram arthaṁ
prārthayante, api tu ye viṣayā niraye\'pi syuḥ, tān ye vāñchanti
**te**\'tyantaṁ **manda-bhāgyā** eva \| **vāñchanti** iti pūrveṇaiva
sambandhaḥ \| yac-chabdena tac-chabda ākṣipyate, evaṁ tac-chabdenāpi
yac-chabdaḥ---yat-tadonityasāpekṣatvāt \| teṣāṁ manda-bhāgyatve narakaḥ
pariṇāma ity āha---**nirayaḥ susaṅgamaḥ**, teṣāṁ nirayaḥ sulabhaḥ syāt
\| tatra hetuḥ---**mātrātmakatvād** viṣayātmakatvāt \|\|54\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **apavarga**-rūpā
**sampat** yasmāt, tam api \| **tat-patim** iti mad-vāñchayā
**sampado**\'pi svayam evādhīnā bhavantīti bhāvaḥ \| tathāpi tā eva
**vāñchanti**, na tu mām iti svāmi-pādair ārthiko nañ vyākhyātam \|
sarva-doṣa-haraṁ sarva-sad-guṇādhāyakaṁ tāsu kathañcin na mat-sambandham
ity arthaḥ \| he **mānini** ! iti mat-prīti-vāñchayaiva mānasyāpy
ācaraṇāt tvādṛśī bhūri-bhāgyaiveti bhāvaḥ \| anyat tair vyākhyātam \|
pakṣāntare---ye tu kevalaṁ prākṛta-viṣaya-bhogam eva **vāñchanti**, te
**durbhagā** evety āha---**mām** iti \| arthaḥ sa eva \|

athavā prasaṅgād viṣaya-kāmukān iva mokṣecchūn nindati---**mām** iti \|
mokṣa-sampadaṁ ye vāñchanti, a-kāra-praśleṣaṇa---yato na vidyate sampat
prema-sampad yeṣu, te \| tasyāḥ prema-**sampadaḥ patiṁ** dātāram api \|
**niraye\'pi** ye syuḥ, tās tu ye vāñchanti, teṣāṁ nirayaḥ
**susaṅgamaḥ** \| anyat samānam \|

yad vā, mayi prema-sampattyaiva mayā saha dāmpatyaṁ sidhyed ity āśayena
tasyāḥ parama-sādhyatvam āha---mokṣa-sampadam api sampade
prema-sampatty-artham eva vāñchanti \|
a-kāra-praśleṣeṇa---**amanda-bhāgyā** bhūri-bhāgāḥ \|\|53\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** ṭīkāyām **apavargeṇa** saha
**sampado** yasminn ity artha-kathanam eva, na tu vigrahaḥ \|
upapada-vibhaktyā samāsābhāvāt **apavarga**-yuktāḥ **sampado** yasminn
iti vigrahaḥ \| samāsaś ca madhya-pada-lopī \| apavargo\'tra mokṣo
bhakti-yogaś ca \| sampadyanta iti **sampado** viṣayāḥ, ataḥ sampada eva
viṣayān iti kākākṣi-nyāyena sampada eva viṣayān eveti yojyam \| anyathā
na tu mām iti na saṅgacchate samāna-vibhakty-antara-vyāvartakatvād
**eva**-kārasya teṣāṁ viṣaya-vāñchakānāṁ **nṛṇāṁ** **nirayo**
nikṛṣṭa-yonir api **su**śobhano\'bhirucitaś cāsau saṅgamanīyaś cety
arthaḥ \| tatra hetuḥ nirayasyāpi viṣayātmakatvād iti \| yad vā, he
**mānini** ! parihāse'pi mad-viccheda-śaṅkayā ātma-koṭito'pi
parama-premāspade mayy apīrṣyāvati apavarga-rūpā prema-bhakti-lakṣaṇā
sampad yasmāt tam api tathā \| **tat-patiṁ**
pūrvokta-dāmpatyādi-sampadaḥ patim api **māṁ prāpya** vaśīkṛtya sampado
dāmpatyādi-sampad-artham eva **vāñchanti** punaḥ punaḥ sevitum īhante,
na tu **mad-arthaṁ,** te manda-bhāgyā apraśasta-bhakti-saṁskāravantaḥ \|
yato ye tat-sampad-vāñchakāḥ, te niraye'pi santi tat-sādṛśyaḥ kathaṁ
mad-bhakti-yogināṁ yujyata iti bhāvaḥ \|

nanu, sampadi-cchākā mahā-vipatti-rūpaṁ nirayaṁ kathaṁ gacchanti ?
tatrāha---**nṛṇāṁ** **mātrātmakatvāt** pāpenāpi tad-upārjakatvāt
**nirayaḥ susaṅgamaḥ** prayatne vināpi labhya ity arthaḥ \| anyat
samānam \|\|53\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** manda-bhāgyatvam eva
darśayati---**ye**\'nye sampad-vāñchakā **niraye\'pi** vartante \|
ye\'nyatra vartante, teṣāṁ **nṛṇāṁ mātrātmakatvād**
atyanta-viṣayāveśātyāgena viṣayārjanān **nirayo\'pi** **susaṅgamaḥ**
anicchayāpi prāpya ity arthaḥ \|\|53\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** imam evārthaṁ
spaṣṭayati---**māṁ prāpya** ity-ādi \| **tat** tasmāt **māṁ patiṁ
prāpya** patitvena labdhvā **apavarga-sampadaṁ ye vāñchanti**,
te'sampado daridrā eva \| daridrāḥ khalu kṣudram eva prārthayante,
te'tyanta-mandabhāgyā eva \| **vāñchanti** iti pūrveṇaivānuṣaṅgaḥ \|
**yac**-chabdena **tac**-chabda ākṣipyate, evaṁ **tac**-chabdenāpi
**yac**-chabdaḥ, yat-tador nitya-sambandhāt \| teṣāṁ manda-bhāgyatvena
kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ? ity āha---**niraya** ity-ādi \| teṣāṁ **nirayaḥ
susaṅgamaḥ** \| tatra hetuḥ---**mātrātmakatvāt**, mātrā viṣayāḥ
\|\|53\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** uktam evārthaṁ
prapañcayati---**mām** iti \| **apa**kṛṣṭā
**varga**-sampan-mokṣānando'pi yatas taṁ **māṁ prāpya** sampadaḥ
prākṛtir eva **vāñchanti,** yatas tāsām api patiṁ dātāraṁ te
sampad-vāñchakā manda-bhāgyāḥ \| yato nārakīṣv api yoniṣu
strīsaṅgādi-viṣaya-sukhāny anāyāsenaiva labhyate ity āha---ye jīvā
**niraye'pi** śukarādi-jātāv api vartante, teṣāṁ **nṛṇāṁ** jīvānāṁ
**mātrātamakatvāt** viṣayātmakatvāt sa niraya eva **susaṅgamaḥ**
strī-saṅgādi-sukha-sādhakatvāt śobhana-saṅgama-hetur ity arthaḥ
\|\|53\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.54 \|\|**

**diṣṭyā gṛheśvary asakṛn mayi tvayā**

**kṛtānuvṛttir bhava-mocanī khalaiḥ \|**

**suduṣkarāsau sutarāṁ durāśiṣo**

**hy asumbharāyā nikṛtiṁ juṣaḥ striyāḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tasmāt he **gṛheśvari** !
**tvayā mayi** **bhava-mocanī** niṣkām**ānuvṛttiḥ** **kṛtā** \| etad
**diṣṭyā** bhadram \| katham-bhūtā ? **khalaiḥ** **suduṣkarā,**
**durāśiṣo** durabhiprāyāyāḥ, ata eva **asumbharāyāḥ**
prāṇa-tarpaṇa-parāyā **nikṛtiṁ** **juṣo** vañcana-parāyāḥ **striyāḥ**
**sutarām** asāv anuvṛttir **duṣkarā** iti \|\|54\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** yasmād viṣayiṇāṁ
niraya-duḥkhaṁ, **tasmād** dhetoḥ \| **asakṛt** punaḥ punaḥ \| duṣṭaḥ
kevala-viṣaya-niṣṭho\'bhiprāyo yasyāḥ, tasyāḥ \| ata eva
durabhiprāyatvād eva \| **asumbharāyāḥ** sva-prāṇa-poṣaṇa-*parāyāḥ* \|
*vañcanaṁ* cātra nija-pātivratya-pradarśana-pūrvakaṁ jāra-sevanaṁ,
tat-*parāyaṇāyāḥ* \| yā **bhava-mocanī** saṁsāra-bandha-mocanī, sā
**tvayā kṛtā**, tava bhayābhāvāt tvayi sā ṛṇavaty evābhūd anyair eva
tvad-anugantṛ-lokaiḥ kṛtā **bhava-mocanī** bhaved iti bhāvaḥ \| nanu,
tarhi khalā api muktāḥ syuḥ ? tatrāha---**khalair** iti \|\|54\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **asakṛt** sadā ity
arthaḥ \| **bhavo** bhakti-pratighātaka-saṁsāra-tāpas tasmān mocayatīti
tathā sā \| ayaṁ svarūpa-mātra-nirdeśaḥ \| yad vā, **bhavasya**
prapañcasyāpi sarvasya **mocanī** śravaṇādinā sarva-duḥkhato mokṣa-karī,
**khalaiḥ** para-doṣa-sūcakaiḥ puruṣaḥ \| **hi** niścitam \|
**durāśiṣa** ity-ādi-viśeṣaṇa-trayasya yathottaraṁ suduṣkaratā-hetutve
śraiṣṭhyam \| evaṁ tasyāḥ khalatvādi-doṣa-nirasanena parama-sādhvītvaṁ
tena **anuvṛtter** dāyam api sūcitam \| he **gṛheśvari** ! iti
sva-dṛṣṭāntena mama sarveṣv api gṛheṣv anuvṛtti-pravartanātvam eva
sarva-gṛha-svāminī iti \| yad vā, **gṛhasyeśvarī** tvam eva, ahaṁ tu
tvad-adhīna eveti bhāvaḥ \|\|54\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : asakṛt** sadā ity arthaḥ \|
seyaṁ ca **tvat-kṛta**-mad-**anuvṛttir** **bhavasya** prapañcasyāpi
sarvasya **mocanī** śravaṇādinā sarveṣām api sarva-duḥkhato mokṣa-karī
\| tarhy etad-ūṛdhvaṁ prapañcaṁ na sthāsyaty eva kiṁ ?
tatrāha---**khalaiḥ** śrī-gurv-ādi-vañcakaiḥ **suduṣkarā** karoty
arthasya sarva-dhātv-artha-vyāpakatvād durbodhādi-rūpāṁ ca **durāśiṣaḥ**
man-niṣṭhatvābhāvād duṣṭā āśīḥ kāmo yasyāḥ \| tatra hetuḥ---yataḥ kutaś
ced indriya-tarpaṇa-mātra-parāyāḥ, yato **nikṛtiṁ juṣaḥ** pūrvavat
khalāyā ity arthaḥ \| **gṛheśvari** ! iti tvayaiva dṛṣṭānta-rūpayā mama
sarveṣv api gṛheṣu **anuvṛttiḥ** pravartiteti tvam eva
sarva-gṛha-svāminīti \| yad vā, **gṛhasyeśvarī** tvam eva, ahaṁ tu
tvad-adhīna eveti bhāvaḥ \|\|54\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tasmād** etat-samāna-vāsanatvāt
te\'pi manda-bhāgyā ity āha---**asakṛt,** sadā ity arthaḥ \| **kṛtā**
pracāritā **bhavasya** sarvasyaiva prapañcasya śravaṇādinā
sarva-duḥkhato **mokṣa-karī**, tarhi ūrdhvaṁ prapañco na sthāsyaty eva
\| tatrāha---**khalair** gārvādibhir mukhaiḥ **duṣkarā** \|
karoty-arthasya sarva-dhātv-artha-vyāpakatvād durbodhādi-rūpā ca
\|\|54-59\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** yā **bhava-mocanī**
saṁsāra-bandha-mocanī sā **tvayā** **kṛtā** iti tava bhayābhāvāt tvayi
sā ṛṇavaty evābhūd anyair eva kṛtā bhava-mocanī bhaved iti bhāvaḥ \|
nanu tarhi khalā api muktāḥ syuḥ ? tatrāha---**khalair** iti \|
**durāśiṣaḥ** durabhiprāyāyā **asumbharāyāḥ** sva-prāṇa-tarpiṇyāḥ
**nikṛtiṁ juṣaḥ** vañcana-parāyā atikhalāyāḥ **striyās** tu **sutarām**
eva suduṣkarā \|\|54\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.55 \|\|**

**na tvādṛśīṁ praṇayinīṁ gṛhiṇīṁ gṛheṣu**

**paśyāmi mānini yayā sva-vivāha-kāle \|**

**prāptān nṛpān na vigaṇayya raho-vaho**[^10] **me**

**prasthāpito dvija upaśruta-sat-kathasya \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kiṁ ca, santi niṣkāmāḥ premṇaiva
mayy anuvartamānā bahvyaḥ, kiṁ tu tvayā sadṛśīṁ kvāpi **na paśyāmi** iti
tasyā bhaktiṁ bahu-mānenābhinandati---**na tvādṛśīm** iti tribhiḥ \|
**upaśrutāḥ satyaḥ kathā** yasya me \|\|55\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** rukmiṇyā bhaktiṁ
gurūkaroti---*kiṁ ca* iti \| kāpi kāsv api kutrāpi vā **yayā** tvayā
**avagaṇayya** tyaktvā **raho-haro** rahasya-prāpakaḥ dūta ity arthaḥ\|
**me** mama pārśve iti śeṣaḥ \| \[*vaiṣṇava-toṣiṇī*\] \|\|55\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **tvādṛśīṁ**
tvat-sadṛśīm, **gṛheṣu** sārvatrikeṣu svīyeṣv api vā, **sva-vivāhasya
kāle** atyāsanna-samaye **raho** rahasyaṁ **vahati** prāpayati iti tathā
saḥ \| \[\"raho-haraḥ\" iti\] pāṭhāntare\'pi sa evārthaḥ \| iti
pitṛ-bhrātr-ādi-sarva-svajaneṣv anādaraḥ sūcitaḥ \| **upaśrutam**
tat-**kathasya** iti sva-gṛhānta-mad-vārtā-śravaṇa-mātreṇaiva, na tu
māhātmyānubhavenety arthaḥ \| he **mānini** ! mānaḥ pūjā
citta-samunnatir vā, tadvad iti tad-yogyā tvam eva, na tv anyeti bhāvaḥ
\|\|55\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : gṛheṣu** sārvatrikeṣu svīyeṣv
api vā **sva-vivāhasya kāle**\'tyāsanna-samaye **raho** rahasyaṁ
**harati** prāpayatīti saḥ \| "raho-vahaḥ" iti pāṭhe\'pi sa evārtha iti
\| tādṛśa-bhāveṣv api pita-mātrādi-sarva-janeṣv apy anādaraḥ sūcitaḥ \|
raho\'tiguhye surate iti viśvaḥ \|
**upaśruta-sat-kathasyeti**---gṛhāntar-mad-vārtā-śravaṇa-mātreṇaiva, na
tu man-māhātmyānubhavenety arthaḥ \| kim utādhunā jāta-paramāsaktitve
satīti bhāvaḥ \| **mānini !** iti---mānaḥ pūjā citta-samunnatir vā, he
tadvati ! tad-yogyā tvam eva, na tv anyeti bhāvaḥ \|\|55\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** dāmpatyaṁ praṇamya tad eva
draḍhayati---**na tvādṛśīm** ity-ādi bahubhiḥ \| ukta-vyākhyānaṁ vinaiva
teṣāṁ vākyānām asaṅgater bhagavato vacanāsauṣṭhava-doṣa-prasaṅgaḥ syāt
\|\|55-57\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (ujjvala-nīlamaṇau 3.6)**: **raho-vahaḥ** rahaḥ
sandeśa-prakāśakaḥ \| **me** ity atra saptamy-arthe ṣaṣṭhī \|\|6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viṣṇudāsaḥ (ujjvala-nīlamaṇau 3.6)**: **na tvādṛśīm** iti kṛṣṇoktiḥ \|
**raho-vahaḥ** rahaḥ-sandeśa-haraḥ \| **upaśruta-sat-kathasyeti**
mat-kathā-śravaṇa-mātrād eva mayi yat tādṛśī dṛḍhā ratir jātā \| ata eva
**tvādṛśīṁ gṛheṣu** aṣṭottara-śatādhika-ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-saṅkhyeṣu
**praṇayinīṁ** premavatīm \|\|6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** paraṁ tu premavatīnāṁ
mad-bhāryāṇām api madhye gṛhiṇo mama tvam eva gṛhiṇī-śreṣṭhā ity
āha---neti \| **māninīti** māna ādaraḥ, he tadvati ! **raho-vahaḥ**
rahasya-vastu prāpakaḥ raho'tiguhye surate iti viśvaḥ \| **upaśrutāḥ
satyaḥ kathā** yasya tasya \| **mama** sthāne \|\|55\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (ujjvala-nīlamaṇau 3.6) : raho-vahaḥ**
rahaḥ-sandeśa-prāpakaḥ \| **me** iti saptamy-arthe ṣaṣṭhī \|\|6\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.56 \|\|**

**bhrātur virūpa-karaṇaṁ yudhi nirjitasya**

**prodvāha-parvaṇi ca tad-vadham akṣa-goṣṭhyām \|**

**duḥkhaṁ samuttham asaho'smad-viyoga-bhītyā**

**naivābravīḥ kim api tena vayaṁ jitās te \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : prodvāha-parvaṇy**
aniruddha-vivāhe \| **akṣa-goṣṭhyāṁ** dyūta-sabhāyām \| **tasya**
bhrātur **vadham** \| tasmin kāle kālāntare vā tad-anusmaraṇataḥ punaḥ
punaḥ **samutthaṁ duḥkham** **asmābhir** ayogo **viyogaḥ**,
tad-**bhītyā** **asahaḥ** soḍhavaty asi \|
anenaivāniruddha-vivāhānantaryam asya jñātavyam \|\|56\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

+++

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** tenātiduḥsahasahanādinā
jitā vaśīkṛtāḥ \| anena tadvadham iti vacanena \| asya śvelyā caritasya
\| kiṁ ca---bhrātur iti bandhuvātsalyena tattadasātā, yadhi nijitasyeti
tvadabhrātṛtvādyuddhe\'pi tasya nirjayāyogyatā, tathā protāhetyādinā
tadānīṁ tadvadhāyogyatā sūcitā \| yato\'sahiṣṭhā ato nābravīś ca \|
bhītiḥ śaṅkā, īśvaro\'yaṁ kadācinmayyanavadhānaṁ kuryādityāśaṅkayety
arthaḥ \| asmad iti bahutvaṁ nijabandhujanāpekṣayā \| ātmanā saha
viyogena tair api tatsiddheḥ \| kiṁ vā---parājitāḥ asmākaṁ
tādṛśa-śakty-abhāvāt \| vayam iti na kevalam ahaṁ madīyāś ca \|\|56\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** bhrātu r iti
bandhuvātsalyena tat-tadasahyatā, yūdhi nirjitasyeti
svabhrātṛtvāyuddhe\'pi tasya nirjayāyogyatā, prodvāhaparvaṇīty ādinā
tadānī tadvadhāyogyatā ca sūcitā, bhītiḥ śaṅkā, kadācida smābhiḥ saha
viyogaḥ syād ityāśaṅka yety arthaḥ \| yad vā, ayogo
duḥkhākulatvenāsaṁyogastasmāddhītyā, asmābhir iti bahutvaṁ
śrī-baladevādīnām apekṣayā, ātmanā saha viyogena tair api tatsiddhaḥ \|
yahā, tasyāstad-bhītyātmano bahumānāt, kiṁ vaktavyam, hṛdi tat-tad
asahiṣṭhā iti kim api nābravīś ca nija-manoduḥkhādikam \| kiṁ vā,
tad-virūpakaraṇādikam api kiñcinnābhivyañjitavatīty arthaḥ \| te tvayā
jitā vaśīkṛtā, kiṁ-vā parājitāḥ, asmākaṁ tādṛśa-śakty abhāvāt \| vayam
iti na kevalam aham, madīyāḥ sarve\'pīty arthaḥ \|\|56\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** kiṁ ca bhrātar iti
bandhavātsalyena tat-tad asahyatā yadhi nijitasyeti tvad-bhrātṛ-tvādy
uddhe\'pi tasya nirjayāyogyatā tathā prodvāha-parvaṇī tyādinā tadānīṁ
tad-vadhāyogyatā sūcitā yato\'saho\'sahiṣṭā ato nābravīś ca bhītiḥ śaṅkā
īśvaroyaṁ kadācit mayyanavadhānaṁ kuryād ity āśaṅkayety arthaḥ \| asmad
iti bahutvaṁ nijabandhujanāpekṣayā ātmanā saha viyogena tair api
tat-siddheḥ te tvayā jitāḥ vaśīkṛtāḥ kiṁ vā parājitā asmākaṁ
tādṛśa-śakty abhāvāt vayam iti na kevalam ahaṁ madīyāś ca \|\|56\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :***na
vyākhyātam*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** prodvāha-parvaṇy
aniruddha-vivāhe akṣa-goṣṭhyāṁ dyūta-sabhāyāṁ tasya bhrātur vadhaṁ
samutthaṁ tatra tatrāsmad-ayoga-bhītyā asmāsu na yujyate nocitī
bhavatīty asmad-ayogas tad-bhītyā kim api duḥkhaṁ naivābravīḥ kīdṛśaṁ ?
asaho durbalaṁ kevalaṁ lokāpakṣaika-hetukatvād iti bhāvaḥ \| punaḥ
kīdṛśaṁ ? samutthaṁ samud yathā syāt tathā tiṣṭhatīti tad duḥkhaṁ
mat-pratikūla-rukmi-hiṁsanādataḥ sukha-sahitam evety arthaḥ \|
anenaivāniruddha-vivāhānantaryam asya jñātavyam \|\|56\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.57 \|\|**

**dūtas tvayātma-labhane suvivikta-mantraḥ**

**prasthāpito mayi cirāyati śūnyam etat \|**

**matvā jihāsa idam aṅgam ananya-yogyaṁ**

**tiṣṭheti tat tvayi vayaṁ pratinandayāmaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** api ca dūta iti \| ātmalabhane
matprāptyartham \| payi cirāyati śvobhāvini vivāhe āgantavyam iti kṛte
samaye kathañcidaprāptavati satyetadviśvaṁ śūnyaṁ
matvedamananyayogyamaṅgaṁ jihāse tyaktumicchāmi tyakṣyāmīty evaṁ dūtaḥ
prasthāpitaḥ \| tathā hy uktaṁ tvayā, yarhy ambujākṣa na labheya
bhavat-prasādaṁ jahyām asūn vrata-kṛśān śata-janmabhiḥ syāt \[bhā.pu.
10. 52.43\] iti \| yad vā, **ajihāsa** iti cchedaḥ \| tyaktum aiccha ity
arthaḥ \| tat tava karma tvayy eva tiṣṭhet, na tat pratikartuṁ śakyam
ity arthaḥ \| kiṁ tu kevalaṁ tvāṁ **pratinandayāmo** harṣayāma iti
\|\|57\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** anyad āha---api ceti \|
suvivikta-mantraḥ suṣṭhu prakāśita-rahovacanaḥ \| jihāsa iti taṅārṣaḥ \|
ārṣatvāśrayaṇasyāgatika-gatikatvādāha---yadveti \| ity artha
iti---sannaṁtājjahāter laṅo madhyama-puruṣaikavacanam iti dhyeyam \| tat
māṁ vinānyatyāga-rūpam \| ity artha
iti---aparicite\'tīvānarāgo\'pratikāryo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ \| pūnaḥ
pūrvānurāgavaiśiṣṭyaṁ smṛtvāha---dūta iti \| asyāyam
evārthaḥ---prasthāpito matpārśva preṣitaḥ \| kīdṛśaḥ suṣṭa vivikto
nirṇikto mantro guptā yuktiryatra saḥ \| tataś ca mayi cirāyati
tadātithyatva-sandeśaśravaṇāveśavamadaiyādibhiḥ kiñcidvilambe sati etat
pitṛbhrātrādi-bandhuyuktam api viśvaṁ śūnyaṁ matvā kutrāpyālaṁ banaṁ na
labdhvedaṁ sarvotkṛṣṭam apyaṁgaṁ śarīramajihāsastyaktamaicchaḥ
durbhagāyā na medhātā ity-ādicintayā bhavatyā\'śābandhacchedāvagamāt
yarhyāmbujākṣa na labheya bhavatprasādam ity-ādipūrvoktasvārasyāc ca \|
ajihāsa ity atra hetuḥ ananyayogyamanyasmai samarpaṇāyogyam ity arthaḥ
\| pratinandayāmaḥ harṣayantīṁ tvāṁ harṣayāmaḥ \|\|57\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** pūnaḥ pūrvānurāgavaiśiṣṭyaṁ
smṛtvā\'ha---dūta iti \| asyāyam evārthaḥ ātmalabhane matprāpty arthaṁ
tvayā dūtaḥ prasthāpitaḥ sa ca sūviviktamantraḥ suṣṭhu nirniktā
gupta-yuktiyantra saḥ tataś ca mayi cirāyati
tadātithyatvatsandeśaśravaṇāveśavamandādibhiḥ kiñcid-vilambamāne sati
etat pitṛmātrādi-bandhuyuktam api viśvaṁ śūnyaṁ matvā kutrāpy
avalambanaṁ na labdhvedaṁ sarvotkṛṣṭam apyaṅgam ajihāsaḥ tyaktum aicchaḥ
\| durbhagāyā na me dhātā ity-ādi cintayā bhavatyā
āśābandhacchedāvagamāt yāmbujākṣa na labheya bhavat-prasādam ity-ādi
pūrvoktasvārasyāc ca ajihāsa ity atra heturanananyayogyam \| anyasmai
samarpaṇāyogyam ity arthaḥ \| pratinandayāmaḥ kevalamanumodāmahe
\|\|57\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** suvivikto mahā-rahasyaḥ
paramavicitro vā mantro gupta-vākyaṁ yasmin saḥ, ity asya jñātatayā
paramanibhūtatvena premaviśeṣaḥ \| sūcitaḥ \| etat
pitṛmātrādi-bandhuvarga-yuktam api viśvaṁ jihāsa \| ity atra
hetuḥ---ananya-yogyam iti \| anyasmai samarpaṇāyogyatvād ity arthaḥ \|
pratinandayāmastvayā kriyamāṇasya mahānandasya praticchāyā-rūpeṇa
kaścinnandayāmaḥ, nandayituṁ yatāma iti \|\|57\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** ātmano mama labhane
labhanāya prāpaṇārthaṁ tataś ca mayi cirāyati vilambamāne sati
etadviśvaṁ śūnyaṁ matvā idamaṅgam ananyayogyam ajihāsaḥ tvaṁ
tyaktumaicchaḥ \| tattava karma tvayyeva tiṣṭhet \| na tat pratikartuṁ
śakyam ity arthaḥ \| kiṁ tu vayaṁ pratinandayāmaḥ harṣayantīṁ tvāṁ prati
harṣayāmaḥ \|\|57\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.58 \|\|**

**śrī-śuka uvāca---**

**evaṁ saurata-saṁlāpair bhagavān jagad-īśvaraḥ**[^11] **\|**

**sva-rato ramayā reme nara-lokaṁ viḍambayan \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : saurata-saṁlāpaiḥ**
surata-narma-goṣṭhībhiḥ \|\|58-59\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** rukmiṇyā guṇān vaktum
aśakyān matvāha śukaḥ---evam iti \| **svarata** ātmārāmo'pi \|
**ramayā** sākṣāl-lakṣamyā \| **viḍambayann** anukurvan \|

\[*toṣaṇī*\]

rukmiṇī-mādhavau vande yayoḥ kalaha-sannibhā \|

vāg-vaidagdhī mithaḥ-stotra-tātparyāścaryatā matā \|

**evam** iti anye'pi tādṛśā bahavo vilāsāḥ sūcitāḥ \| **svarato**
**ramayā** svarūpa-śaktitvena sva-ramaṇa-yogyayā rukmiṇyā **saha reme**
\| tasmin ramaṇe\'pi viśeṣaḥ---**nara**- iti \| krīḍā-lobhenaiśvaryāṁśaṁ
guṇīkṛtya tādṛśa-līlayā **nara-lokam** anukurvann api parama-mādhuryeṇa
tam api hīnopamānaṁ kurvann ity arthaḥ \| yato **bhagavān api
devakī-sutas** tathāvirbhāvanaiva prārabdha-līla ity arthaḥ \|\|58\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** evam ity-ādi \|
surataṁ prema, tad-arhaḥ saṁlāpāḥ **saurata-saṁlāpāḥ**, tair
**nara-lokaṁ viḍambayan** narādi-lokaṁ tiraskurvann alaukiko bhūtvety
arthaḥ \| athavā nara-lokam anukurvan surato\'pi manuṣya-līlām anukurvan
\|\|59\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :**

tau vidagdha-varau vande yayoḥ premoktayo mithaḥ \|

sva-saṁvedyāḥ parair bodhyā na syur bhaktiṁ vinā yayoḥ \|\|

ity anye\'pi tādṛśā bahavaḥ sūcitāḥ **\| svarato**\'pi **ramayā**
śrī-rukmiṇyā **saha reme**, yato **bhagavān** sākṣād īśvaro devakyāḥ
sutaḥ krīḍārthaṁ tasyāṁ jāta ity arthaḥ \| ata eva **nara-lokaṁ
viḍambayan** manuṣya-krīḍām anukuvan \| kiṁ vā, ubhayor aikyāt
sthirīkurvann ity arthaḥ \|

yad vā, nija-sukha-vilāsodrekeṇa tādṛśa-sukhādi-rahitaṁ nara-lokaṁ
tucchīkurvan \| yad vā, **nara-lokaṁ viḍambayann** iti loka-dṛṣṭyā rater
laukikatvam, **bhagavān** iti svaiśvaryam ity evam ekatraiva
laukikatvaiśvaryayor yogena pūrvavad atimādhurī sūcitā \| tatraiva
hetuḥ---**devakī-suta** iti \|\|58\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :**

rukmiṇī-mādhavau vande yayoḥ kalaha-sannibhā \|

vāg-vaidagdhī mithaḥ-stotra-tātparyāś ca yantā matā \|\|

**evam** ity anye\'pi tādṛśā bahavo vilāsāḥ sūcitāḥ \| **svarato**
**ramayā** svarūpa-śaktitvena sva-ramaṇa-yogyayā rukmiṇyā **saha reme**
\| tasmin ramaṇe\'pi viśeṣaḥ---nara- iti \| krīḍā-lobhenaiśvaryāṁśaṁ
guṇīkṛtya tādṛśa-līlayā **nara-lokam** anukurvann api parama-mādhuryeṇa
tam api hīnopamānaṁ kurvann ity arthaḥ \| yato **bhagavān api
devakī-sutas** tathāvirbhāvanaiva prārabdha-līla ity arthaḥ \|\|58\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** evam ity-ādi \| **surataṁ**
prema, tad-arhaḥ **saṁlāpaḥ,** tena **nara-lokam** anukurvan **ramayā**
rukmiṇī-rūpayā lakṣmyā **reme** \| kīdṛśaḥ ? **svarataḥ** sve
nijaiśvarye rataḥ \|\|58\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : saurata-saṁlāpaiḥ**
surata-saṁlāpaiḥ surata-sambandhi-narma-saṁvādaiḥ \| **sva-rata**
ātmārāmaḥ \| ata eva **ramayā** ātma-bhūtayā tayā **reme** \|
**viḍambayan** svayaṁ **nara-līlo**'pi sva-sukha-darśanayā tiraskurvan
taṁ hīnopamānaṁ kurvann ity arthaḥ \|\|58-59\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.60.59 \|\|**

**athānyāsām**[^12] **api vibhur gṛheṣu gṛhavān iva \|**

**āsthito gṛha-medhīyān dharmān loka-gurur hariḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** idam
anyatrātidiśati---tatheti \| yathā rukmiṇyā reme, **tathā** ity arthaḥ
\| athāto hetor **vibhur** api svayam evaikaḥ sarvāṇi gṛhāṇi vyāpnuvan
ity arthaḥ \| etac cānte vyaktaṁ bhāvi\| gṛhavān iveti---yathānyo gṛhī
tathety arthaḥ \| **gṛha-medhīyān** gṛhastha-sambandhinas
tādṛśa-priyā-prema-mayān vaidikāṁś ca **dharmān** **āsthita** ācarad ity
arthaḥ \| yato **loka-guruḥ,** tasmād eva te dharmāḥ pravartata ity
arthaḥ \| yato **haris** tena śīlena sarveṣāṁ manohara ity arthaḥ \| yad
vā, āśritaḥ san reme iti pūrva-kriyayaivānvayaḥ \| ato
gṛha-dharmānuṣṭhāne\'pi krīḍārtham eveti \|\|59\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **atha** māṅgalye \| yad
vā, sarva-preṣṭhatamayā śrī-rukmiṇyā **saha** rater anantaram \|
**vibhur** iti svayam evaikaḥ sarvāṇi gṛhāṇi vyāpnuvann ity arthaḥ \|
etac cāne śrī-nārada-dṛṣṭaiśvaryādhyāye vyaktaṁ bhāvi \| **gṛhavān**
iveti---yathānyo gṛhī tathaivety arthaḥ \| **gṛha-medhīyān**
gṛhastha-sambandhino **dharmān āsthita** ācarad ity arthaḥ \| kim-artham
? **loka**-**gurur** loka-śikṣārtham ity arthaḥ \| yato **hariḥ**
sarva-loka-duḥkha-harteti \| yad vā,
anya-gṛhasthāśakyānantādbhuta-dharmācaraṇena sarveṣāṁ mano harann iti
bhāvaḥ \| iti teṣām asādhāraṇyam uktam \| yad vā, **āsthitaḥ** san
**rema** iti pūrva-kriyayaivānvayaḥ \| iti gṛha-dharmānuṣṭhānam api
krīḍārtham evety arthaḥ \| evaṁ pitṛtvena gṛhavān ivety anena ca
pūrvavad atimādhurī jñeyā \|\|

śrīdhara-svāmi-caraṇair nipītam amṛtaṁ mudā \|

teṣāṁ prasādam ucchiṣṭaṁ kiñcit sañcinumo vayam \|\|59\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : atha** ato hetor **vibhur** api
svayam evaikaḥ sarvāṇi **gṛhāṇi** vyāpnuvann ity arthaḥ \| etac cāne
vyaktībhāvi \| **gṛhavān iva** iti yathānyo gṛhī tathaivety arthaḥ \|
**gṛha-medhīyān** gṛhastha-sambandhinas tādṛśa-priyā-prema-mayān
vaidikāṁś ca **dharmān** **āsthitaḥ** ācarad ity arthaḥ \| yato
**loka-gurus** tasmād eva te dharmāḥ pravartanta ity arthaḥ \| yad vā,
yato **hariḥ,** tena śīlena sarveṣāṁ manohara ity arthaḥ \| **āśritaḥ**
san **reme** iti pūrva-kriyaivānvayaḥ iti pūrva-dharmānuṣṭhānam api
krīḍārtham eveti \|\|59\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** evam ity-ādi \| **surataṁ**
prema, tad-arhaḥ **saṁlāpaḥ**, tena **nara-lokam** anukurvan **ramayā**
rukmiṇī-rūpayā lakṣmyā **reme** \| kīdṛśaḥ ? **sva-rataḥ** sve
nijaiśvarye rataḥ \|\|59\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : ???**

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām \|

daśame'smin ṣaṣṭhitamaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām \|\|

**\...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahāpurāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ

saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ daśama-skandhe kṛṣṇa-rukmiṇī-

saṁvādo nāma ṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ \|

\|\|60\|\|

(10.61)

## ekaṣaṣṭitamo'dhyāyaḥ 

### śrī-kṛṣṇa-[santatīnāṁ]{.mark} varṇanam, aniruddha-vivāhe rukmiṇo vadhaś ca \|

**\|\| 10.61.1 \|\|**

**śrī-śuka uvāca---**

**ekaikaśas tāḥ kṛṣṇasya putrān daśa-daśābalāḥ \|**

**ajījanann anavamān pituḥ sarvātma-sampadā \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

eka-ṣaṣṭhitame śaureḥ putra-pautrādi-santatiḥ \|

aniruddha-vivāhe ca rukmiṇo rāmato vadhaḥ \|\|a\|\|

aṣṭādhika-śata-dvyaṣṭa-sahasra-strī-samudbhavān \|

koṭiśaḥ putra-pautrādīn harir dārair ayojayat \|\|b\|\|

tad etad vaktum āha---ekaikaśa iti \| **kṛṣṇasyābalā** bhāryāḥ \|
**sarvā** yā **ātmani sampattyā** \| **pituḥ** sakāśād **anavamān**
anyūnān \|\|1\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *cād* anyeṣām api \|
*rāmato* baladevāt \|\| aṣṭabhir adhikaṁ śatam *aṣṭādhika-śatam* \|
dvir-āvṛttā aṣṭau *dvyaṣṭau* ca, tāni sahasrāṇi dvyaṣṭa-sahasrāṇi \| tac
ca tāni ca *striyo*'ṣṭādhika-śata-dvy-aṣṭa-sahasra-striyaḥ, *tāsu
samudbhavān* \|\|a-b\|\|

tad etal loka-viḍambanam \| **tā** rukmiṇy-ādyāḥ \|
**sarvātma-sampadā**'nyūna-dehādi-svabhāva-samṛddhyā \| **ajījanan**
janayāmāsuḥ \|\|1\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **tāḥ** ṣā **abalās**
tanv-aṅgyaḥ, **kṛṣṇasya** sarva-śaktimataḥ \| ataḥ **sarvātma-sampadā
anavamān** anyūnān \|\|1\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) : anavamān** anyūnān kṛṣṇasyābalā
na vidyate, taṁ vinā balaṁ gatir yāsāṁ tadṛśa-bhāryā ity arthaḥ
\|\|1\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

ekaṣaṣṭitame kṛṣṇa-putra-pautrābhidhocyate \|

dyūte'han rukmiṇaṁ rāmo'niruddhodvāha-parvaṇi \|\|

tāḥ kṛṣṇasyābalāḥ bhāryāḥ pituḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya sarvā ātma-bhūtāḥ
svarūpa-bhūtā yā sampat tayā anavamān anyūnān \|\|1\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.2 \|\|**

**gṛhād anapagaṁ vīkṣya rāja-putryo'cyutaṁ sthitam**[^13] **\|**

**preṣṭhaṁ nyamaṁsata svaṁ svaṁ na tat-tattva-vidaḥ striyaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : preṣṭhaṁ nyamaṁsata** acyutasya
priyatamaṁ pratyekaṁ **svaṁ svaṁ menire** \| **na** **tasya**
**tattvam** ātmārāmatvaṁ **vidanti** tāḥ \|\|2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : svaṁ svaṁ** nijaṁ nijam
ātmanaṁ deham iti yāvat \| **gṛhāt** sva-sva-purāt \| **anapagam**
prīti-pūrvakam anya-bhāryā-purāṇi nāpagacchantaṁ, kintv anurodha-vaśāt
kadācid eveti\| toṣaṇī ca---**anapagaṁ**
nāyikāntara-gṛha-gamana-rahitam ity āha---**tasya tattvaṁ**
sarva-gṛhāvasthāna-rūpaṁ **na vidantīti** tāḥ \|\|2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** evaṁ śrī-bhagavatas tāsv
āsaktiṁ tāsāṁ ca tasmin pañcabhir varṇayann ādau tad-dhetum
āha---**gṛhād** iti \| **sva-gṛhān** **nāpagacchati** na niḥsaratīti
tathā-bhūtam, yataḥ **sthitaṁ** sthiratayā sva-gṛhe sadā sākṣād
vartamānam ity arthaḥ \| tatra hetuḥ---**rāja-putryaḥ**
sarva-sad-guṇa-rūpādimatya iti bhāvaḥ \| devādi-putrī sattāyām api
rāja-putrya iti tāsām eva prādhānyāt \| evaṁ kasmād api **gṛhāc**
cyuti-rāhityena **acyutam**, ātmānaṁ pratyekaṁ sarvāḥ **svaṁ svaṁ**
**ni**tarām **amaṁsata** \| ittham ātmānam ity eva taiḥ pratyekaṁ svaṁ
svam iti vyākhyātam \| ataḥ "svaṁ svam" iti pāṭhaś cintyaḥ \| **na**
**tasya** anapagam asya acyutasya vā **tattvaṁ** mad-gṛha evānyatrāpi
tiṣṭhatīty eva lakṣaṇaṁ **vindanty** anusandadhatīti tathā tāḥ, yataḥ
**striyas** tat-prema-bhara-mohitā iti bhāvaḥ \|\|2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** ekasya tāvatīṣu tāvat
putra-jananāsambhāvanāṁ kaimutyena pariharati \| tat-prasaṅge tābhiḥ
samam atyāsaktiṁ ca darśayati---**gṛhād** iti \| **sthitam** iti
prativāram eva yathā-samayam eva bahiḥ-pradeśād antaḥ-puram agacchann
iva nija-gṛha evāgatya vartamānam iti \| tathāpi tasmād **anapagaṁ**
nāyikāntara-gṛha-gamana-rahitam **vīkṣya** viṣeśeṇa dṛṣṭvā
**rāja-putrya** ity upalakṣaṇaṁ devādi-putryo'pi ātmānaṁ **preṣṭham
amaṁsata** pratyekam iti \| ṭīkāyāṁ **svaṁ svaṁ** iti punar -uktis tu
pratyekam ātmanaṁ ity asyaiva nirgalitārtha-kathanāya \| svam iti pāṭhe
tu pratyekam ity asya vaiyarthyaṁ syāt \| anyat taiḥ \|

yad vā, **na tasya tattvaṁ** sarva-gṛhāvasthāna-rūpaṁ **vidanti** iti
tāḥ, tad-vilāsa-bhara-mohenānyānusandhānāsakter iti bhāvaḥ \|\|2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (prīti-sandarbhaḥ 140)** : ātmānaṁ pratyekam eva
**preṣṭhaṁ** sarvataḥ priyatamam **amaṁsata** ity arthaḥ \| ata eva
**atattva-vidaḥ,** ūrdhvordhva-preyasī-sad-bhāvāt \|\|2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tattvaṁ** sarva-gṛha-sthitatvam
\|\|2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** gṛhād ity-ādi \| **striyaḥ**
satyabhāmādyā **rāja-putryaḥ** \| **atad** yathā bhavati, sāmānya
strī-bhāvavad yathā na bhavati, tathā \| **svaṁ svam** ātmānaṁ
**preṣṭhaṁ** sarvataḥ priyatamaṁ **nyamaṁsata** nitarāmam anyata \|
kīdṛśyaḥ ? tatvavida ātma-tatvajñāḥ yad vā, na vidyante tasya
śrī-kṛṣṇasya tatvavido yābhyas tāḥ, tā yathā kṛṣṇa-tattvaṁ jānanti, na
tathānye ke\'pīti bhāvaḥ \| kiṁ kṛtvā ? **gṛhāt** sva-gṛhād **anapagaṁ**
yugapad eva sarveṣu gṛheṣu sadā santam **acyutaṁ** **vīkṣya** ātmānam
eva **preṣṭham amaṁsata** \|\|1-2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : gṛhāt** sva-sva-purāt
**anapagaṁ** prīti-pūrvakam anya-bhāryā-purāṇi na apagacchantaṁ, kiṁ tu
anurodha-vaśād eva kadācid eveti **vīkṣya** ātmānaṁ **svaṁ svam** eva
**preṣṭhaṁ** parama-subhagaṁ **nyamaṁsata,** na tv anya-janam \| kiṁ tv
atarkya-yoga-māyayā sarva-priyā-jana-subhagatā-sampādakaṁ **tasya
tattvaṁ na vidant**i iti tāḥ \|\|2\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.3 \|\|**

**cārv-abja-kośa-vadanāyata-bāhu-netra-**

**sa-prema-hāsa-rasa-vīkṣita-valgu-jalpaiḥ \|**

**sammohitā bhagavato na mano vijetuṁ**

**svair vibhramaiḥ samaśakan vanitā vibhūmnaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ātmārāmatvaṁ vyanakti
dvayena---cārv iti \| **cārv-abja-kośa-**vad **vadanaṁ** ca **āyatāni**
**bāhu-netrāṇi** ca **sa-premṇā hāsa-rasena vīkṣitāni** ca \|
**valgu-jalpāś** ca **bhagavataḥ** etaiḥ **saṁmohitā** vanitāḥ **svaiḥ**
svair anekair **vibhramais** tasya śrī-kṛṣṇasya **mano vijetuṁ** hartuṁ
**na samaśakan,** na śaktā babhūvuḥ \| **vibhūmnaḥ** paripūrṇasya
\|\|3\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** nanv evaṁ
tasyātikāmukatvam eva pratīyate ? na, kiṁ tu premaika-vaśatvam evety
udāharati dvābhyām \| **vanitā** janitātyarthānurāgās tāḥ striyaḥ
**svaiḥ** strī-jātīyaiḥ **vibhramair** vilāsair **bhagavato mano**
**vi**śeṣeṇa tat-premādhika-sapatnī-tulyatvena **jetuṁ** vaśīkartuṁ
**nāśakan**, kiṁ tu sva-premāṁśānurodheneti bhāvaḥ \| ata eva
**sa-prema-** iti \| **vanitā**-śabdena gṛhād anapagāmitvaṁ vaśatvaṁ ca
lakṣitam \| yadyapi vi-saṁ-śabdayor ekatareṇāpy abhīṣṭārtha-lābhaḥ,
tathāpi vi-śabdena śrī-bhagavati vaśībhāva-cihnaṁ, saṁ-śabdena tāsv api
tat-kṛti-yogya-cihnaṁ tādṛśaṁ na dṛṣṭam iti pṛthag avasitaṁ \|

tādṛśa-vimama-vyañjane hetuś---**cārv** iti \|
**cārv-abja-kośa-vadanādibhiḥ sammohitāḥ**, preraṇā kāmena vā kṣobhitā
iti \| atra pūrvaṁ **vadanaṁ** paśyanti, paścāl lajjā-dṛṣṭyā **bāhuṁ**,
tatas tad-darśanena gāḍhāliṅgana-spṛhā-jāta-dhārṣṭyena punar mukhe
dṛśyamāne mitho netra-melanaṁ, tataḥ **sa-prema-hāsādi** iti \|

etad uktaṁ bhavati---parasparaṁ tasya tābhiḥ saha prema-vaśatāsty eva,
kiṁ tu kadācit tat-premādhika-sapatnīvat tan-mano vaśīkartuṁ kāmamayān
vilāsān darśayanti, tadā tasya tadvat tan na syāt, ity ato na
kāmukatvaṁ, kiṁ tu prema-viśeṣa-vaśatvam eveti \| **vibhūmnaḥ**
sarvāpekṣya-paripūrṇasya kāmukatvaṁ na sambhavati \|
bhakta-vaśyatva-rūpa-mahā-guṇasya tu tatra sad-bhāvo'sty eveti, ahaṁ
bhakta-parādhīnaḥ \[bhā.pu. 9.4.64\] ity-ukteḥ \| ata eva
gopāla-tāpinyām uktam---vidyāmayo yaḥ sa kathaṁ viṣayī bhavati ? yo hi
kāmena kāmān kāmayate, sa kāmī bhavati \| yo hi vai tv akāmena kāmān
kāmayate, so\'py akāmī bhavati \[go.tā.u. 2.19-20\] iti śruteḥ \|
**cārū** ramyo yo\'**bja-kośo**'mbuja-madhya-bhāgaḥ, tat-tulyaṁ
**vadanam** āsyaṁ, tathā \|\|3\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :**
**cārv-abja-kośa-vadanādīnāṁ** yathottaraṁ sammohane śraiṣṭhyam \| tatra
vadanād api **bāhvor āyatatayā** gāḍhāliṅganābhiprāyeṇa \| **bhagavata**
iti lokātīta-sammohana-sāmādika vanitam \| ataḥ **samyak** **mohitā**
ākṛṣṭa-cittā api **vibhūmno\'pi** mano-viśeṣeṇa bhaktebhyo\'dhikatayā
**jetuṁ** vaśīkartuṁ **na samyag** **aśakan** kim ? kākvā, api tu
samyaktayā śekur evety arthaḥ \| evam agre\'pi \| kutaḥ ? **svair**
asādhāraṇaiḥ prema-viśeṣa-mayair ity arthaḥ \| ata eva
**vanitā**-janita-puruṣārthānurāgā yoṣitaḥ parama-svatantrasyāpīśvarasya
priya-jana-prema-paravaśatvād iti bhāvaḥ \| tathā coktaṁ
śrī-bhagavataiva ahaṁ bhakta-parādhīno hy asvatantra iva dvija \[bhā.pu.
9.4.63\] ity-ādi \| evam anyonyaṁ bhāva-viśeṣeṇānyonyaṁ mohanam uktam \|
yad vā, vijetuṁ viśeṣeṇa jetuṁ vaśīkartum, yathā vraja-devyo vijigyire,
tathā jetum ity arthaḥ \|\|3\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** nanv evaṁ tasyātikāmukatvām
iva pratīyate ? na, kiṁ tu premaika-vaśatvam evety udāharaṁs tāpaṁ mohaṁ
ca darśayati---**cārv iti** dvābhyām \| **vanitāḥ** janitātyarthānurāgās
tāḥ striyaḥ **svaiḥ** strī-jātīya-**vibhramair** vilāsair **bhagavato**
**mano** **vijetuṁ** viśeṣeṇa sva-sva-tat-premādhikasya patnī-tulyatvena
**jetuṁ** vaśīkartuṁ **na** **samyag aśakan**, kiṁ tu yāvāṁs
tat-premāṁśaḥ, tāvad evety arthaḥ \| ata eva **sa-prema-** iti tasyāpi
prema-nigaḍenaivoktam \|

**vanitā**-śabdena gṛhānapagāmitvaṁ lakṣitaṁ vaśatvaṁ ca \| yadyapi
vi-saṁ-śabdayor ekatareṇāpy abhīṣṭārtha-lābhaḥ syāt, tathāpi vi-śabdena
śrī-bhagavati vaśībhāva-cihnaṁ, saṁ-śabdena tāsv api
tat-kṛti-yogyatva-cihnaṁ tādṛśaṁ dṛṣṭam iti pṛthag avasitam \|

tathā tādṛśa-vibhrama-vyañjane hetuḥ---cārv iti \|
**cārv-abja-kośa-vadanādibhiḥ** **sammohitāḥ** samyak premṇā kāmena ca
kṣobhitā iti \| atra pūrvaṁ vadanaṁ paśyanti, paścāl lajjā-namra-dṛṣṭyā
**bāhuṁ,** tatas tad-darśanena gāḍhāliṅgana-spṛhā-jāta-dhārṣṭyena punar
mukhe dṛśyamāne mitho netra-milanaṁ, tataḥ **sa-prema-hāsādi** iti
pāṭha-krameṇa vyaktam \|

etad uktaṁ bhavati---parasparaṁ tasya tābhiḥ prema-vaśatāsty eva, kiṁ tu
yadi kadācit tat-premādhika-sapatnīvat tan-mano vaśīkartum anaṅga-bāṇaiḥ
\[bhā.pu. 10.61.4\] iti vakṣyamāṇān kāmamayān vilāsa-viśeṣān darśayati
\| tadā tasya tadvat tan na syād ity ato na kāmukatvaṁ, kiṁ tu
prema-viśeṣavattvam eveti \| tac ca yuktam ity āha---**vibhūmnaḥ**
svataḥ sarvāpekṣaṇīya-paripūrṇasya, tataḥ kāmukatvaṁ na sambhavati,
bhakta-vaśatva-rūpasya mahā-guṇasya tu tatra sad-bhāva eveti bhāvaḥ \|
tad uktam---ahaṁ bhakta-parādhīno hy asvatantra iva dvija \[bhā.pu.
9.4.64\] iti \| atas tam uddiśya śrī-gopāla-tāpanyām apy
uktaṁ---vidyāmayo hi yaḥ, sa kathaṁ viṣayī bhavatīti ? yo ha kāmena
kāmān kāmayate, sa kāmī bhavati \| yo ha vai tv akāmena kāmān kāmayate,
so'py akāmī bhavati \[go.tā.u. 2.19-20\] iti \|\|3\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (prīti-sandarbhaḥ 141)** : nanv ātmārām asya kathaṁ
patnīṣu prema ? ucyate, tāsu ramaṇatvenaiva lokavan na tasya prema,
kintu śuddha-prema-sambandhenaiva \| tathā hi---cārv iti \| atra
**sa-prema-** iti tāsu śrī-kṛṣṇa-prema darśitam \| ata eva
**vanitā**-śabda-prayogaḥ \| vanitā-janitātyarthānurāgāyāṁ ca yoṣiti iti
nānārtha-vargāt \| tena tasmin tāsāṁ ca prema darśitam \| atas
tat-prema-mātra-vijitaṁ yad **bhagavato manaḥ**, tat tu **svaiḥ**
kevala-strī-jātīyair **vibhramair** **vijetuṁ na śekur** ity arthaḥ
\|\|3\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : cārv** iti tattvam \|\|3-10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** na tu taṁ vaśīkartuṁ śekur
ity āha--- cārv iti dvābhyām \|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** bhagavad-vilāsa-mātreṇāpi
vaśībhūtānāṁ tāsāṁ samañjasa-ratimattvāt prema-mayāḥ kāma-mayāś ca
vilāsāḥ sambhavanti \| tatra kāma-mayair vilāsais tasyā vaśībhāvam
āha---**cārv** iti dvābhyām \| **cārv-abja-koṣavad vadanaṁ** ca **āyatau
bāhū āyate netre** ca **sa-prema-hāsa-rasena vīkṣitāni** ca **valgu
jalpāś** ca taiḥ **sammohitāḥ** **svaiḥ** svīyair **vibhramair**
vilāsais tasya **mano vijetuṁ na samaśakan** \| tatra
hetuḥ---**vibhūmnaḥ** svata eva sarvāpekṣaṇīya-padārtha-paripūrṇasya
\|\|3\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.4 \|\|**

**smāyāvaloka-lava-darśita-bhāva-hāri-**

**bhrū-maṇḍala-prahita-saurata-mantra-śauṇḍaiḥ \|**

**patnyas tu ṣoḍaśa-sahasram anaṅga-bāṇair**

**yasyendriyaṁ vimathituṁ karaṇair na śekuḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tāsāṁ vibhramān varṇayann etad
vivṛṇoti---**smāya**- iti \| **smāyo** gūḍha-hasitaṁ,
tad-yukto'**valoka-lavaḥ kaṭākṣaḥ,** tena **darśitaḥ** sūcito
**bhāvo**'bhiprāyaḥ, tena **hāri** mano-haraṇa-śīlaṁ yad
**bhrū-maṇḍalaṁ,** tena **prahitāḥ** prasthāpitā ye **sauratā**
**mantrāḥ,** teṣu **śauṇḍaiḥ** pragalbhair **anaṅgasya bāṇaiḥ** śaraiḥ,
anyaiś ca **karaṇaiḥ** kāma-śāstra-prasiddhair **yasyendriyaṁ** mano
**vimathituṁ** kṣobhayituṁ ṣoḍaśa-sahasram api **patnyo** **na śekur**
iti \|\|4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *tāsāṁ* strīṇāṁ \|
**sauratāḥ** suratodbodhakāḥ \| **śauṇḍo** matte pragalbhe ca khyāte
śauṇḍī tu pippalā iti dharaṇiḥ \| kāma-śāstra-prasiddhair hāvādibhiḥ \|
**yasya** kṛṣṇasya \| **na śekur** vaśīkrita-kāmatvena dṛḍha-vīryatvāt
\| **bāṇa**-śabdena **bhrū-maṇḍalasya** dhanuṣṭvaṁ dhvanitam,
**maṇḍala**-śabdena tasyākṛṣṭatam \|

\[*vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī*\] tataś ca tādṛśa-bhrū-maṇḍalena prahitā muktāś ca
saurata-mantra-śauṇḍāś ceti vigrahaḥ \| anye'pi **bāṇā** mantrā
**śauṇḍā** bhavantīti \| **yasya** iti yac-chabdasyāntima-nirdeśāt
tac-chabdānapekṣayaivānvayaḥ \| tathā cālaṅkārikāḥ---yac-chabdo'py
uttara-vākyārtha-gatatvenopapatteḥ pūrva-vākya-gatasya
tac-chabdasyopādānaṁ nāpekṣate iti \| yathā---

> sādhu candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtaṁ
>
> mīlitaṁ yad abhirāmatādhike \|
>
> udyatā jayini rādhikā[^14]-mukhe
>
> tena sāhasam anuṣṭhitaṁ punaḥ \|\| \[rāma-carita-mahākāvye 2.95\] iti
> \|\|4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** **anaṅga-bāṇair**
**mathituṁ na śekuḥ**, premṇā tu śekur eva \|\|4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** **smāyety**-ādikaṁ
vibhramāṇāṁ viśeṣaṇam, **anaṅga-bāṇānām** eva viśeṣaṇam, tataś ca na
tiṣṭhaty aṅgaṁ yebhyas tathā-bhūtair marma-bhedibhir bāṇair ity arthaḥ
\| evaṁ bāṇa-śabdena **bhrū-maṇḍalasya** dhanuṣṭvaṁ dhvanitam, tataś
caivaṁ vākyaṁ---tādṛśa-bhrū-maṇḍalena **prahitā** muktāś ca te
**saurata-mantra-śauṇḍāś** ca tair iti \| **vimathituṁ** viśeṣeṇa
mathitum, yathā vraja-devyo viśeṣeṇa mamanthus tathā mathituṁ **na
śekur** iti \|\|4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** smāyety-ādikaṁ vibhramāṇāṁ
viśeṣaṇam \| **prahitatvaṁ** vyañjitatvaṁ saurata-mantratvaṁ
surata-sambandhi-rahasya-yuktitvam **anaṅga-bāṇais** tad-rūpair ity
arthaḥ \| yad vā, tad eva vivṛṇoti---**karaṇaiḥ**
kāma-śāstra-prasiddhair upāyair **vi**śeṣeṇa **mathituṁ na śekur** iti
pūrvavat teṣāṁ rūpakam **anaṅga-bāṇair** ity eṣāṁ viśeṣaṇam \|
**bhrū-maṇḍala-** iti bāṇa-śabdena ca bhrū-maṇḍalasya dhanuṣṭvaṁ
dhvanitam \| **maṇḍala**-śabdena tasyākṛṣṭatvaṁ, tataś ca
tādṛśa-bhrū-maṇḍalena **prahitā** muktāś ca te
**saurata-mantra-śauṇḍāś** ceti vigrahaḥ \| anye'pi **bāṇā** mantreṇa
**śauṇḍā** bhavantīti \|

**yasya** iti yac-chabdasyāntima-nirdeśāt tac-chabdānapekṣayaivānvayaḥ
\| tathā cālaṅkārikāḥ yac-chabdo'py uttara-vākyārtha-gatatvenopapatteḥ
pūrva-vākya-gatasya tac-chabdasyopādānaṁ nāpekṣata iti \| tathā---

> sādhu candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtaṁ
>
> mīlitaṁ yad abhirāmatādhike \|
>
> udyatā jayini rādhikā-mukhe
>
> tena sāhasam anuṣṭhitaṁ punaḥ \|\| \[rāma-carita-mahākāvye 2.95\] iti
> \|

evaṁ śrī-vraja-devīnāṁ tatra tatra parama-śuddhotkṛṣṭaṁ
prema-praśaṁsanād ābhyaḥ sarvābhyo'py ādhikyaṁ sūcitam \|\|4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (prīti-sandarbhaḥ 142)** :
strī-jātīya-vibhramānuvāda-pūrvakaṁ pūrvārtham eva
viśadayati---**smāya**- iti \| svayam eva **anaṅga-bāṇa-rūpaiḥ
karaṇair** bhāva-hāvādibhir **smāya**- iti \| tāni
viśinaṣṭi---**smāya**- iti \| **smāyaḥ** smitam \| **bhāvo**'bhiprāyaḥ
\| tādṛśa-**bhrū-maṇḍalaiḥ prahitā** vikṣiptāś ca te
**saurata-mantraiḥ** surata-rūpārtha-sādhaka-mantraiḥ **śauṇḍāḥ**
pragalbhāś ca te tādṛśaiḥ \|\|4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) : anaṅga-bāṇair vimathituṁ na
śekuḥ**, premṇā tu śekur eva \|\|4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tāsāṁ kāmamayān vibhramān
vivṛṇoti---**smāya-** iti \| **karaṇa**-śabdasyendriya-vācakatvāt
karaṇair netrair **anaṅga-bāṇair yasya** kṛṣṇasya **indriyaṁ vimathituṁ
na śekuḥ** \| kīdṛśaiḥ ? **smāyaṁ** smitaṁ tat-sahito'**valoka-lavaḥ**
kaṭākṣaḥ, tena **darśitaḥ** sūcito'bhiprāyaḥ, tena **hāri**
manoharaṇa-śīlaṁ yad **bhrū-maṇḍalaṁ,** tena **prahitāḥ** prasthāpitā ye
**saurata-mantrāḥ,** teṣu **śauṇḍaiḥ** pragalbhaiḥ \|\|4\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.5 \|\|**

**itthaṁ ramā-patim avāpya patiṁ striyas tā**

**brahmādayo'pi na viduḥ padavīṁ yadīyām \|**

**bhejur mudāviratam edhitayānurāga-**

**hāsāvaloka-nava-saṅgama-lālasādyam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : anurāgeṇa hāso\'valokaś** ca
**nava-saṅgame lālasam** autsukyaṁ ca te **ādyā** yasya
vibhrama-kadambasya, taṁ **bhejuḥ** \|
**anurāga-hāsāvaloka-nava-saṅgama-lālasādyaṁ bhejuḥ,** tasya mano
vijetuṁ na śekur iti vā \|\|5\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : tā** rukmiṇy-ādyāḥ \|
**yadīyāṁ** yat-sambandhinīm \| vibhrama-padādhyāhāre gauravaṁ
matvārthāntaraḥ---**anurāga-** iti \| pūrveṇaiva sambandhaḥ \| **navo**
nitya-nūtanaḥ **saṅgamo**'ṅga-saṅgaś ca **lālasā** tṛpty-abhāvaś ca,
tad-**ādyaṁ** tad-ādika-vilāsam aneka-sva-kartṛkaṁ kṛṣṇa-kartṛkaṁ vā
**bhejuḥ** \| tathāham api tac-citto nidrāṁ ca na labhe niśi \[bhā.pu.
10.53.2\] iti bhagavad-ukti-jñāpyaḥ---

īkṣito\'ntaḥ-pura-strīṇāṁ sa-vrīḍa-prema-vīkṣitaiḥ \|

kṛcchrād visṛṣṭo niragāj jāta-hāso haran manaḥ \|\| \[bhā.pu. 10.70.16\]
iti \|

reme strī-ratna-kūṭastho bhagavān prākṛto yathā \[bhā.pu. 1.11.36\]
ity-ādikokti-jñāpyaś ca pārijātādy-apaharaṇa-śāpyaś ca tāsāṁ
premamaya-vilāsais tad-vaśībhāvas tv asty eveti jñeyam\|\|5\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** yasya bhagavataḥ, taṁ
preṣṭhaṁ nyamaṁsata \[bhā.pu. 10.61.2\] iti pūrveṇa \| kiṁ vā,
**ramāpatim** iti pareṇānvayaḥ \| **tu** api \| ṣoḍaśa-sahasram api, na
tu katicid ity arthaḥ \| pūrvoktānusāreṇa sāṣṭaśatādhikaṁ jñeyam \| ity
uktena tan-mano-vaśīkaraṇa-prakāreṇa \|\|5-6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tataś ca tāsāṁ brahmādibhir
api durgama-bhajanaṁ darśayati---ittham iti \| **ramāpatiṁ**
śrī-rukmiṇī-kāntaṁ śrī-gopī-rūpāṇāṁ parama-ramāṇāṁ vā ramaṇaṁ nirantaraṁ
vardhamānayā mudā tādṛśāvalokana-yukta-**nava-saṅgama-lālasā** **ādyā**
yatra, tad yathā syāt, tathā **bhejuḥ** \|\|5\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tāsāṁ premamayair
vibhramais tad indriya-mathana-kāraṇakam aṅga-saṅgaṁ cāha---ittham iti
\| **anurāgaḥ** prema-vilāsa-viśeṣas tanmayo yo hāsāvalokaḥ, tena
**navaḥ** nitya-nūtanaḥ **saṅgamo** aṅga-saṅgaś ca **lālasā**
tṛpty-abhāvaś ca tad-ādyaṁ tad-ādikam aneka-vilāsaṁ svakattu ke
kṛṣṇa-kartṛkaṁ vā **bhejuḥ,** tathāham api tac-citto nidrāṁ ca na labhe
niśi \[bhā.pu. 10.53.2\] iti bhagavad-ukti-jñāpyaḥ---

īkṣito\'ntaḥ-pura-strīṇāṁ sa-vrīḍa-prema-vīkṣitaiḥ \|

kṛcchrād visṛṣṭo niragāj jāta-hāso haran manaḥ \|\| \[bhā.pu. 10.70.16\]
iti \|

reme strī-ratna-kūṭastho bhagavān prākṛto yathā \[bhā.pu. 1.11.36\]
ity-ādi-śukokti-jñāpyaś ca pārijātādy-āharaṇa-jñāpyaś ca tāsāṁ
premamayair vilāsais tad-vaśībhāvas tv asty eveti jñeyam \|\|5\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.6 \|\|**[^15]

**pratyudgamāsana-varārhaṇa-pāda-śauca-**

**tāmbūla-viśramaṇa-vījana-gandha-mālyaiḥ \|**

**keśa-prasāra-śayana-snapanopahāryair**

**dāsī-śatā api vibhor vidadhuḥ sma dāsyam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kiṁ tu **pratyudgamādibhir**
**vibhos** tasya **dāsyaṁ** nityaṁ **vidadhur** iti \| prauḍha-bhāve\'pi
nava-saṅgamādy-abhidhānam agata-sāratvena autsukyena ca tathā pratīteḥ
\| teṣām eva ślokānāṁ prastāvāntare punaḥ punar āvṛttir iti saundaryāt
\|\|6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** sevanānurāgam
āha---*kintv* iti \| **varārhaṇaṁ** puṣpāñjali-ratnāñjali-nikṣepādi \|
*prauḍha-bhāve\'pi* navoḍhātvābhāve'pi \| *agata-sāratvena*
eka-rasa-rūpa-yauvanādimattvena *autsukyena* anurāgādhivayena ca \|
*tathā-pratīter* nava-saṅgamāsvāda-pratīteḥ \| *teṣām eva* pūrvoktānām
eva \| *prastāvāntare* prakṛtāntare \|\|6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīnātha-cakravartī (caitanya-mata-mañjuṣā) :** tad
evāha---**pratyudgama-** ity-ādi \| **dāsyaṁ** sevākhyāṁ
prema[-ḷāṁ]{.mark} sādhyāṁ bhaktim ity arthaḥ \|\|6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** kiṁ ca---**pratyudgama-**
ity-ādi \| prasāreti prasādheti vā pāṭhaḥ \| eṣāṁ
prāyo\'nukramopacāratvaṁ gamyaṁ \| **varārhaṇaṁ**
puṣpa-lāja-ratnāli-nikṣepādi atra ṭīkāyāṁ *prauḍha-bhāve*'pīty-ādikaṁ
prakaraṇa-saṅgamanaṁ tathā teṣām eveti prathama-skandhādy-uktānām ity
arthaḥ \|\|6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī), jīva-gosvāmī
(krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tāsāṁ
tad-viṣayaka-premṇaḥ paricaryātma-kānanubhāvān āha---**pratyudgama-**
iti \| **varārhaṇaṁ** puṣpāñjali-ratnāñjali-nikṣepādi \|\|6\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.7-8 \|\|**

**tāsāṁ yā daśa-putrāṇāṁ kṛṣṇa-strīṇāṁ puroditāḥ \|**

**aṣṭau mahiṣyas tat-putrān pradyumnādīn gṛṇāmi te \|\|**

**cārudeṣṇaḥ sudeṣṇaś ca cārudehaś ca vīryavān \|**

**sucāruś cāruguptaś ca bhadracārus tathāparaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** prāsaṅgikam uktvā prastutam
āha---**tāsām** iti \| **daśa daśa putrā** yāsāṁ, tāsāṁ madhye\'ṣṭī
**mahiṣyo** yāḥ prāg-uktās **tat-putrān** iti \|\|7-12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *prāsaṅgikaṁ*
prasaṅgānugatam \| **tāsāṁ** sarvāsām\| **tat-putrān**
rukmiṇy-ādi-putrān \| **te** tubhyam \|\|7\|\| pradyumnād anyeṣāṁ kāni
nāmānīty ata āta---**cārudeṣṇa** iti \| **vīryavān** iti sarva-viśeṣaṇam
\|\|8\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tāsāṁ putrān iti anyāsāṁ
pratyekaṁ putrāṇām uktau prayojanābhāvāt, ati-bāhulyena
prastuta-kathā-rasa-vidhātāc ca \| pradyumna ādiryeṣāṁ tān iti tasya
sarvebhyo jyeṣṭhatvāt rūpaguṇādinā śreṣṭhatvāc ca \| vīryavān iti
sarveṣāṁ viśeṣaṇam, atas tat-samuccayārthaṁ prāyaḥ sarvatraiva ca-śabdaḥ
\| tatheti ca paraścāruguptasyānuja ity arthaḥ \| evam agrajānujakrameṇa
sarve jñātavyā iti bhāvaḥ \|\|7-8\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** tat-putrān tāsām eva putrān
ity arthaḥ \| bāhulyabhiyeti bhāvaḥ \|\|7-8\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tad evāha---pratyudgamety
ādi \| dāsyaṁ prema-lakṣaṇaṁ sādhyaṁ pādasevākhyabhaktim \|\|7-40\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** prāsaṅgikam uktvā
prastutam āha---tāsām iti \| daśa-daśa putrāḥ yāsāṁ tāsāṁ madhye yā
aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ prāg uktāḥ \|\|7-13\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.9 \|\|**

**cārucandro vicāruś ca cāruś ca daśamo hareḥ \|**

**pradyumna-pramukhā jātā rukmiṇyāṁ nāvamāḥ pituḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), vaṁśīdharaḥ
(bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** daśama ity ekādaśābhāvaṁ
draḍhyati \| evaṁ sarvam agre\'nyatrāpi jñeyam \| harer iti manoharasya
tasya putrā api tādṛśā iti bhāvaḥ \| anenaivābhiprāyeṇa sarvatra
cāru---śabdaḥ, ata eva pitṛrnāvamā nyūnā na bhavanti, pūrvoktasyāpy asya
punar uktis tad-dārḍhyārtham \| ato\'gre\'pi sarvatredam anuvartyam
\|\|9\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** cāviti yugmakam \| vīryavān
iti sarveṣāṁ viśeṣaṇam atas tat-samuccayārthaṁ prāyaḥ sarvatraiva
ca-śabdaḥ tatheti ca paraścāru-guptasyānuja ity arthaḥ \| evam
agrajānuja-krameṇa sarve jñātavyā iti bhāvaḥ \| daśama ity ekādaśābhāvaṁ
dṛḍhayati evaṁ sarvam agre'pi jñeyaṁ harer iti sarva-manoharasya tasya
putrā api tādṛśāḥ yathābījaṁ tathāṅkaram iti nyāyeneti bhāvaḥ \|
anenaivābhiprāyeṇa sarvatra cāru-śabdaḥ ata eva piturnāvamā nyūnā na
bhavanti pūrvoktasyāpy asya punar uktis tad-dārḍhyam atogre'pi
sarvatredam anuvartyam \|\|9\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ),
viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.10 \|\|**

**bhānuḥ subhānuḥ svarbhānuḥ prabhānur bhānumāṁs tathā \|**

**candrabhānur bṛhadbhānur atibhānus tathāṣṭamaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** svarbhānuḥ svarge\'pi
yasya dīptiryaśa ity arthaḥ \|\|10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** bhānur iti sārdhakam \|
aṣṭama iti para itivat bhānu-śabdaś cāruśabdavat jyeṣṭhāyā jāmbavatyāḥ
prāk satyabhāmāyāḥ putrāṇām uktiḥ premādhikyena tasyāḥ śreṣṭhayāt evam
agre'pi jñeyam \|\|10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī),jīva-gosvāmī
(krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī
(sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.11 \|\|**

**śrībhānuḥ pratibhānuś ca satyabhāmātmajā daśa \|**

**sāmbaḥ sumitraḥ purujic chatajic ca sahasrajit \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : purujid** asaṅkhya-jayī
\|\|11-12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** sāmba iti ca sārdhakam \|
draviṇo draviḍaś ceti pāṭha-dvayaṁ \| **hi** eva \| pitrā sammatāḥ
nyāyādanapetatvena niścitāḥ evaṁ sāmba-purāṇādau sāmbavṛjinasya
nārada-kalpitatvenaiva prasiddhatvāt tatra śrī-bhagavato'pi loka
śikṣābhiprāyeṇaiva tad icchatvāta yathā musala-śāpādāvapīti bhāvaḥ
\|\|11-12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : sāmbādyāḥ** pitṛ-sammatāḥ
\|\|11-40\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī
(sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.12 \|\|**

**vijayaś citraketuś ca vasumān draviḍaḥ kratuḥ \|**

**jāmbavatyāḥ sutā hy ete sāmbādyāḥ pitṛ-sammatāḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), vaṁśīdharaḥ
(bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ), jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :**
*na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** aṣṭama iti para itivat,
viśeṣata ś ca dīptyā cārudeṣṇādibhyo\'pyādhikyaṁ bodhayati, jyeṣṭhāyāḥ
śrī-jāmbavatyāḥ prāk śrī-satyabhāmāyāḥ putrāṇām uktiḥ prauḍhatayā prāk
tat-putrotpatteḥ \| kiṁ vā, premādhikyena tasyāḥ śreṣṭhyāt \| evam
agre\'pi jñeyam \| hi eva, pitā vatsalo yeṣu te, pitur
atyanta-sneha-viṣayā evety arthaḥ \| iti kutrāpi kathyamānaḥ
śrī-sāmbāparādho nirastaḥ vastuto loka-śikṣārtham-eva tasya kāritatvena
māyikatvād iti dik \|\|12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** sāmbādyāḥ pitṛ-sammatā iti
\|\|12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī
(sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.13 \|\|**

**vīraś candro'śvasenaś ca citragur vegavān vṛṣaḥ \|**

**āmaḥ śaṅkur vasuḥ śrīmān kuntir nāgnajiteḥ sutāḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** śrīmān iti vasoḥ kunter vā
viśeṣaṇam \|\|13\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** vegavān iti nāmaiva \|
amātrogān hinastīty āmaś cikitsā-vijñaḥ taddhita-pratyayānāṁ sarvārthe
vidhānād dhisāyāmatrāṇ \|\|13\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** śrīmān iti tair
vyākhyātam \| yad vā, śrī-satyabhāmātmajānāṁ bhānu-nāmatvāt śrīmān eko
bhānuś candraś caiko jñeyaḥ, hariścandrādivat sañjñāyāṁ sūḍāgamaḥ, asa
kārapāṭho vā \|\|13\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** śrīmān iti sarveṣām eva vā
viśeṣaṇam \|\|13\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ),
viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.14 \|\|**

**śrutaḥ kavir vṛṣo vīraḥ subāhur bhadra ekalaḥ \|**

**śāntir darśaḥ pūrṇamāsaḥ kālindyāḥ somako'varaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** bhadro nāma ekala ekaḥ \|
somako\'varaḥ kanīyān \| ete kālindyāḥ sutā iti \|\|14\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** vṛṣa-padāvṛttistu
pravṛtti-nimitta-bhedāt, pūrva vṛṣa-padaṁ dharmavat-param iha tu
vadānyaparam

> vṛṣo dharme balīvarde rāśyākhuśukraleṣu ca \|
>
> śreṣṭhe syād uttarasthoyaṁ vyāse\'pi parikīrtitaḥ \|\| iti medinī \|

vīra iti vṛṣa-viśeṣaṇaṁ, sarveṣāṁ vā \| svāminā tvekala iti
bhadraviśeṣaṇaṁ kṛtvā bīra iti nāmāntaram evoktam \| pūrva vīrapadaṁ
śūraparamiha tu vīrāḥ santyasyeti vīro matvarthīyāc \| avaraś ca rame
triṣu iti dharaṇiḥ iha jyaiṣṭhyānuja-bhāvastuddeśakramata eva jñeyaḥ
\|\|14\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** ekala ekaḥ, na tu bhadra
iti sarveṣāṁ viśeṣaṇam ity arthaḥ \|\|14\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** bhrātṛṇām api madhye
dvayorvaṣa ity ekanāmatvaṁ kenacid aparihāryeṇa kāraṇena bhavet
vyavahārastu mātrādinām aviśeṣaṇena siddhayatīti jñeyam evam agre
vīro'pi tad-vaccharabalāv api \|\|14\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** bhadro-nāma ekalaḥ ekaḥ
somako\'varaḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ \|\|14\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.15 \|\|**

**praghoṣo gātravān siṁho balaḥ prabala ūrdhagaḥ \|**

**mādryāḥ putrā mahāśaktiḥ saha ojo'parājitaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** mādrayā lakṣmaṇāyāḥ \|\|15\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** sahaoja ity atra vini
lopaḥ gamyamānasyāprayoga eva lopaḥ iti kaiyaṭaḥ \|\|15\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** sahādayas trayo\'py
akārāntāḥ \| yad vā, saha ojaso sāntau, aparājita takārāntaḥ
dvandva-samāsaḥ, sañjñāpekṣayā tannāyoḥ puṁstvam \| kiṁ vā, mūrtaṁ saha
eva oja evety abhiprāyeṇa napuṁsakatvam \|\|15\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** saha ojasī sakārānte mūtaṁ
saha evām ity ādyabhiprāyeṇa putrāḥ sutāḥ iti pāṭha-dvayam \|\|15\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** māyāḥ lakṣmaṇāyāḥ
\|\|15-17\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.16 \|\|**

**vṛko harṣo'nilo gṛdhro vardhanonnāda eva ca \|**

**mahāṁsaḥ pāvano vahnir mitravindātmajāḥ kṣudhiḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kṣudhiś ca daśamaḥ \| ete
mitravidātmajāḥ \|\|16\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** mahānāśo bhojanaṁ yasya sa
tathā \| vaiyadhikaraṇye pūrva-padasyākāra ārṣatvād eva \| mahaṁ
tejo\'śruta iti vā mahaś ca mahasā saha iti dvirūpakośāt \|\|16\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** eva api, annādo\'pi,
mahāṁsaś ca, vardhanādisañjñāyā sāmyena, mahāśa iti pāṭhaś ca kvacit ,
śevyānām api saiveti ṭīkāsyāsti, mitravindātmajā ity asyānantaraṁ
lekhyāyā api lekhaka-bhrameṇaiva \|\|16\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** saha ojasī sakārānte mūtaṁ
saha evām ity ādyabhiprāyeṇa putrāḥ sutāḥ iti pāṭha-dvayam \|\|15\|\|
mahāṁśa ity atra mahāsiḥ kacit vahvana ity atra vardhanaḥ kacit
\|\|16\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ),
viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.17 \|\|**

**saṅgrāmajid bṛhatsenaḥ śūraḥ praharaṇo'rijit \|**

**jayaḥ subhadro bhadrāyā vāma āyuś ca satyakaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** saṅgrāmajit-pramukhāḥ satyakāntā
bhadrāyāḥ satāḥ, śaibyānāmāpi saiva \|\|17\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** saiva bhava \| aṣṭānāṁ
sarva-mukhyānāṁ putrānuktvā ṣoḍaśa-sahasramukhyāyā rohiṇyā
āha---dīptimān iti \|\|17\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** bhadrāyāḥ sutā ity
asyānantaraṁ lekhaḥ, śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇīyai-tat-prasaṅge śaivyāyāṁ
mitravindāyām \[vi.pu. 5.32.3\] iti tathātraivāgre kurukṣetra-yātrāyāṁ
środraupado praśne śaitye mitravinde iti ca śrī-svāmi-pādair eva
vyākhyātatvāt \|\|17\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** saṅgrāmeti śevyānām api
saiveti ṭīkā vyākhyāyāstu mitravindātmajā ity asyānantaraṁ yogyāyāḥ api
lekhaka-bhrameṇaiva bhadrāyāḥ sutā ity asyānantaraṁ lekhaḥ
śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇe hy etat-prasaṅge śaibyāyāṁ mitravindāyām \[vi.pu.
5.32.3\] iti tathātraivāgre kurukṣetra-yātrāyāṁ śrī-draupadī-praśne
śaibyati mitravinde iti ca ṭīkaiva \|\|17\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ),
viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.18 \|\|**

**dīptimāṁs tāmra-taptādyā rohiṇyās tanayā hareḥ \|**

**pradyumnāc cāniruddho'bhūd rukmavatyāṁ mahā-balaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** rohiṇyāḥ satānām uktir anyāsām
upalakṣaṇārtham \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** prāsaṅgika m
āha---pradyumnād iti \| bhojakaṭe---sthitasyeti śeṣaḥ \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** rohiṇī
śatādhika-ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-mahiṣīṇāṁ mukhyā, tasyām, tvarthe cakāraḥ \|
pautrotpattyābhinnopakramāt tu-śabdo virodhe, śrī-bhagavad-veṣiṇo
rukmiṇaḥ putryāṁ tatrāpi tat-pure śrīmad-aniruddhotpattaḥ, ata
evāścaryād āha---he rājann iti \| rājamāna iti vā \| eteṣāṁ
śrī-pradyumnādīnāmḥ he nṛpeti ānanyenādbhutatvāt \|\|18-19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** dīptīty ardhakam \| rohiṇī
śatādhika-ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-mahiṣīṇāṁ mukhyā tasyāḥ \|\|18\|\|

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na
vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** aṣṭānāṁ sarva-mukhyānāṁ
putrānuktvā ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-mukhyāyā rohiṇyā āha---dīptimān iti
\|\|18\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.19 \|\|**

**putryāṁ tu rukmiṇo rājan nāmnā bhojakaṭe pure \|**

**eteṣāṁ putra-pautrāś ca babhūvuḥ koṭiśo nṛpa \|\|**

**mātaraḥ kṛṣṇa-jātīnāṁ sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa \|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** eteṣām iti \| anyeṣām api
śrī-kṛṣṇa-putrāṇāṁ śata-saṅkhyastrīṣu putrāḥ pautrāś ca koṭiśo babhūvaḥ
\| tatra hetutvena śrī-kṛṣṇa-patnīnāṁ bāhulyamanusmārayati \| mātaraḥ
kṛṣṇa-jātānām iti \| ca-śabdenādhikāś cety uktam \|\|19 \|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** eteṣāṁ pradyumnādīnām \|
tatra kṛṣṇa-putra pautrānantye \| adhikā aṣṭottara-śatam iti jñeyam
\|\|19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (laghu-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** āścaryād āha---he rājan iti !
eteṣāṁ śrī-pradhumnādīnām \|\|19\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī), jīva-gosvāmī
(krama-sandarbhaḥ, bṛhat-krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** mātara iti kṛṣṇa-jātānāṁ
mātara eva saṅkhyātuṁ śakyate natu putra-pautrādayaḥ tāś ca
ṣoḍaśa-sahasrāṇi aṣṭottara-śatāni ca \|\|19\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 10.61.20 \|\|**

**śrī-rājovāca---**

**kathaṁ rukmy ari-putrāya prādād duhitaraṁ yudhi \|**

**kṛṣṇena paribhūtas taṁ hantuṁ randhraṁ pratīkṣate \|\|**

**etad ākhyāhi me vidvan dviṣor vaivāhikaṁ mithaḥ**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** yaḥ kṛṣṇaṁ hantuṁ randhra
pratīkṣate sa kathaṁ prādād iti \| baivāhikaṁ vivāha-nimittam \|\|20\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** ariputrāya kṛṣṇa-putrāya
\| randhramavakāśam \| yo rukmī \| vivāha-nimittaṁ vivāhakāraṇam \|
raṁdhra tu dūṣaṇe chidre iti medinī \|\|20\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**sanātana-gosvāmī (bṛhad-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī) :** areḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya putrāya
prādāt praṇayenādāt \| arintvam eva darśayati---yudhi paribhūta iti \|
pratīkṣate apekṣate mṛgayate vā \| he vidvann iti tat-tvayā jñāyata
eveti bhāvaḥ \|\|20\|\|
